analyzed: sa ca sarvaḥ nikhilena śrūyate sma

original: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā yogino yogācārāḥ prāptaphalāścāprāptaphalāśca,
analyzed: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ yoginaḥ yoga ācārāḥ prāpta phalāḥ ca a prāpta phalāḥ ca

original: te 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /
analyzed: te pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma

original: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anekavividhaśravaṇārambaṇādhimuktihetukāraṇairupāyakauśalyairbodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
analyzed: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ aneka vividha śravaṇa ārambaṇa adhimukti hetu kāraṇaiḥ upāya kauśalyaiḥ bodhisattva caryām caranti

original: te 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /
analyzed: te pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma

original: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtāḥ,
analyzed: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtāḥ

original: te 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma /
analyzed: te pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma

original: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu parinirvṛtānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dhātustūpā ratnamayāḥ te 'pi sarve saṃdṛśyante sma //
analyzed: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu parinirvṛtānām buddhānām bhagavatām dhātustūpāḥ ratna mayāḥ te sarve saṃdṛśyante sma

original: atha khalu maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - mahānimittaṃ prātihāryaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatena kṛtam /
analyzed: atha khalu maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya etat abhūt mahā nimittam prātihāryam bata idam tathāgatena kṛtam

original: ko nvatra heturbhaviṣyati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yadbhagavatā idamevaṃrūpaṃ mahānimittaṃ prātihāryaṃ kṛtam?
analyzed: kaḥ nu atra hetuḥ bhaviṣyati kim kāraṇam yat bhagavatā idam evaṃrūpam mahā nimittam prātihāryam kṛtam

original: bhagavāṃśca samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
analyzed: bhagavān ca samādhim samāpannaḥ

original: imāni caivaṃrūpāṇi mahāścaryādbhutācintyāni maharddhiprātihāryāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma /
analyzed: imāni ca evaṃrūpāṇi mahā āścarya adbhuta acintyāni mahā ṛddhi prātihāryāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma

original: kiṃ nu khalvahametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ paripṛccheyam?
analyzed: kim nu khalu aham etam artham paripraṣṭavyam paripṛccheyam

original: ko nvatra samarthaḥ syādetamarthaṃ visarjayitum?
analyzed: kaḥ nu atra samarthaḥ syāt etam artham visarjayitum

original: tasyaitadabhūt - ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlo bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ /
analyzed: tasya etat abhūt ayam mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ pūrva jina kṛta adhikāraḥ vara āpita kuśala mūlaḥ bahu buddha paryupāsitaḥ

original: dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi ca anena mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃrūpāṇi nimittāni bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: dṛṣṭa pūrvāṇi ca anena mañjuśriyā kumāra bhūtena pūrvakāṇām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām evaṃrūpāṇi nimittāni bhaviṣyanti

original: anubhūtapūrvāṇi ca mahādharmasāṃkathyāni /
analyzed: anubhūta pūrvāṇi ca mahā dharma sāṃkathyāni

original: yannvahaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametamarthaṃ paripṛccheyam //
analyzed: yat nu aham mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam etam artham paripṛccheyam

original: tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ bahūnāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ
analyzed: tāsām catasṛṇām parṣadām bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsaka upāsikānām bahūnām ca deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣyāṇām imam evaṃrūpam

original: bhagavato mahānimittaṃ prātihāryāvabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptānāmadbhutaprāptānāṃ
analyzed: bhagavataḥ mahā nimittam prātihārya avabhāsam dṛṣṭvā āścarya prāptānām adbhuta prāptānām

original: kautūhalaprāptānāmetadabhavat - kiṃ nu khalu vayamimamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavato maharddhiprātihāryāvabhāsaṃ kṛtaṃ paripṛcchema?
analyzed: kautūhala prāptānām etat abhavat kim nu khalu vayam imam evaṃrūpam bhagavataḥ mahā ṛddhi prātihārya avabhāsam kṛtam paripṛcchema

original: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ
analyzed: atha khalu maitreyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tasmin eva kṣaṇa lava muhūrte tāsām catasṛṇām

original: parṣadāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya ātmanā ca dharmasaṃśayaprāptastasyāṃ velāyāṃ
analyzed: parṣadām cetasā eva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāya ātmanā ca dharma saṃśaya prāptaḥ tasyām velāyām

original: mañjuśriyaṃ (Vaidya 4)
analyzed: mañjuśriyam vaidya

original: kumārabhūtametadavocat - ko nvatra mañjuśrīrhetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadayamevaṃrūpa āścaryādbhuto bhagavatā ṛddhayavabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ,
analyzed: kumāra bhūtam etat avocat kaḥ nu atra mañjuśrīḥ hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yat ayam evaṃrūpaḥ āścarya adbhutaḥ bhagavatā ṛddhaya avabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: imāni cāṣṭādaśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇi vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni paramadarśanīyāni tathāgatapūrvaṃgamāni tathāgatapariṇāyakāni saṃdṛśyante?
analyzed: imāni ca aṣṭādaśa buddhakṣetra sahasrāṇi vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni parama darśanīyāni tathāgata pūrvaṃgamāni tathāgata pariṇāyakāni saṃdṛśyante

original: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu maitreyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam ābhiḥ gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣata

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ mañjuśirī iyaṃ hi raśmiḥ pramuktā naranāyakena /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam iyam hi raśmiḥ pramuktā nara nāyakena

original: prabhāsayantī bhramukāntarātu ūrṇāya kośādiyamekaraśmiḥ // Saddhp_1.1 //
analyzed: prabhāsayantī ūrṇāya

original: māndāravāṇāṃ ca mahanta varṣaṃ puṣpāṇi muñcanti surāḥ suhṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: māndāravāṇām ca varṣam puṣpāṇi muñcanti surāḥ su hṛṣṭāḥ

original: mañjūṣakāṃścandanacūrṇamiśrān divyān sugandhāṃśca manoramāṃśca // Saddhp_1.2 //
analyzed: mañjūṣakān candana cūrṇa miśrān divyān sugandhān ca manoramān ca

original: yehī mahī śobhatiyaṃ samantāt parṣāśca catvāra sulabdhaharṣāḥ /
analyzed: samantāt

original: sarvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ imu saṃprakampitaṃ ṣaḍbhirvikārehi subhīṣmarūpam // Saddhp_1.3 //
analyzed: sarvam ca kṣetram su bhīṣma rūpam

original: sā caiva raśmī purimādiśāya aṣṭādaśakṣetrasahasra pūrṇāḥ /
analyzed: sā ca eva

original: avabhāsayī ekakṣaṇena sarve suvarṇavarṇā iva bhonti kṣetrāḥ // Saddhp_1.4 //
analyzed: eka kṣaṇena sarve suvarṇa varṇāḥ iva bhonti kṣetrāḥ

original: yāvānavīcī paramaṃ bhavāgraṃ kṣetreṣu yāvanti ca teṣu sattvāḥ /
analyzed: paramam bhavāgram kṣetreṣu yāvanti ca teṣu sattvāḥ

original: ṣaṭsū gatīṣū tahi vidyamānā cyavanti ye cāpyupapadyi tatra // Saddhp_1.5 //
analyzed: cyavanti ye tatra

original: karmāṇi citrā vividhāni teṣāṃgatīṣu dṛśyanti sukhā dukhā ca /
analyzed: karmāṇi citrā vividhāni dṛśyanti ca

original: hīnā praṇītā tatha madhyamā ca iha sthito addaśi sarvametat // Saddhp_1.6 //
analyzed: ca iha sarvam etat

original: buddhāṃśca paśyāmi narendrasiṃhān prakāśayanto vivaranti dharmam /
analyzed: buddhān ca paśyāmi narendra siṃhān prakāśayantaḥ dharmam

original: (Vaidya 5)
analyzed: vaidya

original: praśāsamānān bahusattvakoṭīḥ udāharanto madhurasvarāṃ giram // Saddhp_1.7 //
analyzed: praśāsamānān bahu sattva koṭīḥ udāharantaḥ madhura svarām giram

original: gambhīranirghoṣamudāramadbhutaṃ muñcanti kṣetreṣu svakasvakeṣu /
analyzed: gambhīra nirghoṣam udāram adbhutam muñcanti kṣetreṣu svaka svakeṣu

original: dṛṣṭāntahetūnayutāna koṭibhiḥ prakāśayanto imu buddhadharmam // Saddhp_1.8 //
analyzed: koṭibhiḥ prakāśayantaḥ buddha dharmam

original: duḥkhena saṃpīḍita ye ca sattvā jātījarākhinnamanā ajānakāḥ /
analyzed: duḥkhena saṃpīḍita ye ca sattvāḥ jātī jarā khinna manāḥ a jānakāḥ

original: teṣāṃ prakāśenti praśāntanirvṛtiṃ duḥkhasya anto ayu bhikṣave ti // Saddhp_1.9 //
analyzed: teṣām prakāśenti praśānta nirvṛtim duḥkhasya antaḥ bhikṣave ti

original: udārasthāmādhigatāśca ye narāḥ puṇyairupetāstatha buddhadarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: udāra sthāma adhigatāḥ ca ye narāḥ puṇyaiḥ upetāḥ buddha darśanaiḥ

original: pratyekayānaṃ ca vadanti teṣāṃ saṃvarṇayanto ima dharmanetrīm // Saddhp_1.10 //
analyzed: pratyeka yānam ca vadanti teṣām saṃvarṇayantaḥ dharma netrīm

original: ye cāpi anye sugatasya putrā anuttaraṃ jñāna gaveṣamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca api anye sugatasya putrāḥ anuttaram jñāna gaveṣamāṇāḥ

original: vividhāṃ kriyāṃ kurviṣu sarvakālaṃ teṣāṃ pi bodhāya vadanti varṇam // Saddhp_1.11 //
analyzed: vividhām kriyām sarvakālam teṣām bodhāya vadanti varṇam

original: śṛṇomi paśyāmi ca mañjughoṣa iha sthito īdṛśakāni tatra /
analyzed: śṛṇomi paśyāmi ca mañjughoṣaḥ iha īdṛśakāni tatra

original: anyā viśeṣāṇa sahasrakoṭyaḥ pradeśamātraṃ tatu varṇayiṣye // Saddhp_1.12 //
analyzed: anyāḥ sahasra koṭyaḥ pradeśa mātram varṇayiṣye

original: paśyāmi kṣetreṣu bahūṣu cāpi ye bodhisattvā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
analyzed: paśyāmi kṣetreṣu bahūṣu ca api ye bodhisattvāḥ gaṅgavālikāḥ

original: koṭīsahasrāṇi analpakāni vividhena vīryeṇa janenti bodhim // Saddhp_1.13 //
analyzed: koṭī sahasrāṇi analpakāni vividhena vīryeṇa janenti bodhim

original: dadanti dānāni tathaiva kecid dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ suvarṇam /
analyzed: dadanti dānāni tathā eva kecid dhanam hiraṇyam rajatam suvarṇam

original: muktāmaṇiṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālaṃ dāsāṃśca dāsī rathaaśvaeḍakān // Saddhp_1.14 //
analyzed: muktāmaṇim śaṅkha śilā pravālam dāsān ca dāsī ratha aśva eḍakān

original: (Vaidya 6)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śibikāstathā ratnavibhūṣitāśca dadanti dānāni prahṛṣṭamānasāḥ /
analyzed: śibikāḥ tathā ratna vibhūṣitāḥ ca dadanti dānāni prahṛṣṭa mānasāḥ

original: pariṇāmayanto iha agrabodhau vayaṃ hi yānasya bhavema lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_1.15 //
analyzed: pariṇāmayantaḥ iha agrabodhau vayam hi yānasya bhavema lābhinaḥ

original: traidhātuke śreṣṭhaviśiṣṭayānaṃ yadbuddhayānaṃ sugatehi varṇitam /
analyzed: traidhātuke śreṣṭha viśiṣṭa yānam yat buddha yānam sugate hi varṇitam

original: ahaṃ pi tasyo bhavi kṣipra lābhī dadanti dānāni imīdṛśāni // Saddhp_1.16 //
analyzed: aham kṣipra lābhī dadanti dānāni imā īdṛśāni

original: caturhayairyuktarathāṃśca kecit savedikān puṣpadhvajairalaṃkṛtān /
analyzed: catur hayaiḥ yukta rathān ca kecid sa vedikān puṣpa dhvajaiḥ alaṃkṛtān

original: savaijayantān ratanāmayāni dadanti dānāni tathaiva kecit // Saddhp_1.17 //
analyzed: sa vaijayantān rata nāmayāni dadanti dānāni tathā eva kecid

original: dadanti putrāṃśca tathaiva putrīḥ priyāṇi māṃsāni dadanti kecit /
analyzed: dadanti putrān ca tathā eva putrīḥ priyāṇi māṃsāni dadanti kecid

original: hastāṃśca pādāṃśca dadanti yācitāḥ paryeṣamāṇā imamagrabodhim // Saddhp_1.18 //
analyzed: hastān ca pādān ca dadanti yācitāḥ paryeṣamāṇāḥ imam agra bodhim

original: śirāṃsi kecinnayanāni kecid dadanti kecitpravarātmabhāvān /
analyzed: śirāṃsi kecid nayanāni kecid dadanti kecid pravara ātma bhāvān

original: datvā ca dānāni prasannacittāḥ prārthenti jñānaṃ hi tathāgatānām // Saddhp_1.19 //
analyzed: da tvā ca dānāni prasanna cittāḥ prārthenti jñānam hi tathāgatānām

original: paśyāmyahaṃ mañjuśirī kahiṃcit sphītāni rājyāni vivarjayitvā /
analyzed: paśyāmi aham mañjuśirī kahiṃcid sphītāni rājyāni vivarjayitvā

original: antaḥpurān dvīpa tathaiva sarvān amātyajñātīṃśca vihāya sarvān // Saddhp_1.20 //
analyzed: antaḥpurān dvīpa tathā eva sarvān amātya jñātīn ca vihāya sarvān

original: upasaṃkramī lokavināyakeṣu pṛcchanti dharmaṃ pravaraṃ śivāya /
analyzed: upasaṃkramī loka vināyakeṣu pṛcchanti dharmam pravaram śivāya

original: kāṣāyavastrāṇi ca prāvaranti keśāṃśca śmaśrūṇyavatārayanti // Saddhp_1.21 //
analyzed: kāṣāya vastrāṇi ca keśān ca śmaśrūṇi avatārayanti

original: kāṃścicca paśyāmyahu bodhisattvān bhikṣū samānāḥ pavane vasanti /
analyzed: kāṃścid ca paśyāmi ahu bodhisattvān bhikṣū samānāḥ pavane vasanti

original: (Vaidya 7)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śūnyānyaraṇyāni niṣevamāṇān uddeśasvādhyāyaratāṃśca kāṃścit // Saddhp_1.22 //
analyzed: śūnyāni araṇyāni niṣevamāṇān uddeśa svādhyāya ratān ca kāṃścid

original: kāṃścicca paśyāmyahu bodhisattvān girikandareṣu praviśanti dhīrāḥ /
analyzed: kāṃścid ca paśyāmi ahu bodhisattvān giri kandareṣu praviśanti dhīrāḥ

original: vibhāvayanto imu buddhajñānaṃ paricintayanto hyupalakṣayanti // Saddhp_1.23 //
analyzed: vibhāvayantaḥ buddha jñānam paricintayantaḥ hi upalakṣayanti

original: utsṛjya kāmāṃśca aśeṣato 'nye paribhāvitātmāna viśuddhagocarāḥ /
analyzed: utsṛjya kāmān ca aśeṣatas nye viśuddha gocarāḥ

original: abhijña pañceha ca sparśayitvā vasantyaraṇye sugatasya putrāḥ // Saddhp_1.24 //
analyzed: abhijña pañca iha ca sparśayitvā vasanti araṇye sugatasya putrāḥ

original: pādaiḥ samaiḥ sthitviha keci dhīrāḥ kṛtāñjalī saṃmukhi nāyakānām /
analyzed: pādaiḥ samaiḥ sthitvā iha dhīrāḥ kṛtāñjalī saṃmukhi nāyakānām

original: abhistavantīha harṣaṃ janitvā gāthāsahasrehi jinendrarājam // Saddhp_1.25 //
analyzed: abhistavanti iha harṣam janitvā gāthā sahasrehi jinendra rājam

original: smṛtimanta dāntāśca viśāradāśca sūkṣmāṃ cariṃ keci prajānamānāḥ /
analyzed: dāntāḥ ca viśāradāḥ ca sūkṣmām carim prajānamānāḥ

original: pṛcchanti dharmaṃ dvipadottamānāṃ śrutvā ca te dharmadharā bhavanti // Saddhp_1.26 //
analyzed: pṛcchanti dharmam dvipada uttamānām śrutvā ca te dharma dharāḥ bhavanti

original: paribhāvitātmāna jinendraputrān kāṃścicca paśyāmyahu tatra tatra /
analyzed: jinendra putrān kāṃścid ca tatra tatra

original: dharmaṃ vadanto bahuprāṇakoṭināṃ dṛṣṭāntahetūnayutairanekaiḥ // Saddhp_1.27 //
analyzed: dharmam vadantaḥ bahu prāṇa koṭinām dṛṣṭānta hetūn ayutaiḥ anekaiḥ

original: prāmodyajātāḥ pravadanti dharmaṃ samādapento bahubodhisattvān /
analyzed: prāmodya jātāḥ pravadanti dharmam samādapentaḥ bahu bodhisattvān

original: nihatya māraṃ sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ parāhanantī imu dharmadundubhim // Saddhp_1.28 //
analyzed: nihatya māram sa balam sa vāhanam parāhanantī imu dharma dundubhim

original: paśyāmi kāṃścit sugatasya śāsane saṃpūjitānnaramaruyakṣarākṣasaiḥ /
analyzed: paśyāmi kāṃścid sugatasya śāsane saṃpūjitān nara maru yakṣa rākṣasaiḥ

original: avismayantān sugatasya putrān anunnatān śāntapraśāntacārīn // Saddhp_1.29 //
analyzed: a vismayantān sugatasya putrān an unnatān śānta praśānta cārīn

original: (Vaidya 8)
analyzed: vaidya

original: vanaṣaṇḍa niśrāya tathānyarūpā avabhāsu kāyātu pramuñcamānāḥ /
analyzed: vana ṣaṇḍa pramuñcamānāḥ

original: abhyuddharanto narakeṣu sattvāṃstāṃścaiva bodhāya samādapenti // Saddhp_1.30 //
analyzed: abhyuddharantaḥ narakeṣu sattvān tān ca eva bodhāya samādapenti

original: vīrye sthitāḥ keci jinasya putrā middhaṃ jahitvā ca aśeṣato 'nye /
analyzed: vīrye sthitāḥ jinasya putrāḥ middham jahitvā ca aśeṣatas nye

original: caṃkramyayuktāḥ pavane vasanti vīryeṇa te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.31 //
analyzed: caṃkramya yuktāḥ pavane vasanti vīryeṇa te prasthita agra bodhim

original: ye cātra rakṣanti sadā viśuddhaṃ śīlaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ maṇiratnasādṛśam /
analyzed: ye ca atra rakṣanti sadā viśuddham śīlam akhaṇḍam maṇi ratna sādṛśam

original: paripūrṇacārī ca bhavanti tatra śīlena te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.32 //
analyzed: paripūrṇa cārī ca bhavanti tatra śīlena te prasthita agra bodhim

original: kṣāntībalā keci jinasya putrā adhimānaprāptāna kṣamanti bhikṣuṇām /
analyzed: kṣāntībalā keci jinasya putrāḥ kṣamanti bhikṣuṇām

original: ākrośa paribhāṣa tathaiva tarjanāṃ kṣāntyā hi te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.33 //
analyzed: ākrośa paribhāṣa tathā eva tarjanām kṣāntyā hi te prasthita agra bodhim

original: kāṃścicca paśyāmyahu bodhisattvān krīḍāratiṃ sarva vivarjayitvā /
analyzed: kāṃścid ca bodhisattvān krīḍā ratim vivarjayitvā

original: bālān sahāyān parivarjayitvā āryeṣu saṃsargaratān samāhitān // Saddhp_1.34 //
analyzed: bālān sahāyān parivarjayitvā āryeṣu saṃsarga ratān samāhitān

original: vikṣepacittaṃ ca vivarjayantān ekāgracittān vanakandareṣu /
analyzed: vikṣepa cittam ca vivarjayantān ekāgra cittān vana kandareṣu

original: dhyāyanta varṣāṇa sahasrakoṭyo dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.35 //
analyzed: dhyāyanta sahasra koṭyaḥ dhyānena te prasthita agra bodhim

original: dadanti dānāni tathaiva kecit saśiṣyasaṃgheṣu jineṣu saṃmukham /
analyzed: dadanti dānāni tathā eva kecid sa śiṣya saṃgheṣu jineṣu saṃmukham

original: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānnaṃ gilānabhaiṣajya bahū analpakam // Saddhp_1.36 //
analyzed: khādyam ca bhojyam ca tathā anna pānnam bahu analpakam

original: vastrāṇa koṭīśata te dadanti sahasrakoṭīśatamūlya kecit /
analyzed: vastrāṇa koṭī śata te dadanti sahasra koṭī śata mūlya kecid

original: (Vaidya 9)
analyzed: vaidya

original: anarghamūlyāṃśca dadanti vastrān saśiṣyasaṃghāna jināna saṃmukham // Saddhp_1.37 //
analyzed: anargha mūlyān ca dadanti vastrān sa śiṣya saṃghān jinān saṃmukham

original: vihāra koṭīśata kārayitvā ratnāmayāṃśco tatha candanāmayān /
analyzed: vihāra koṭī śata kārayitvā ratna āmayān ca tathā candana āmayān

original: prabhūtaśayyāsanamaṇḍitāṃśca niryātayanto sugatāna saṃmukham // Saddhp_1.38 //
analyzed: prabhūta śayyā āsana maṇḍitān ca niryātayantaḥ sugatāna saṃmukham

original: ārāma caukṣāṃśca manoramāṃśca phalairupetān kusumaiśca citraiḥ /
analyzed: ārāma caukṣān ca manoramān ca phalaiḥ upetān kusumaiḥ ca citraiḥ

original: divāvihārārtha dadanti kecit saśrāvakāṇāṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇām // Saddhp_1.39 //
analyzed: divāvihāra artha dadanti kecid sa śrāvakāṇām puruṣa ṛṣabhāṇām

original: dadanti dānānimamevarūpā vividhāni citrāṇi ca harṣajātāḥ /
analyzed: dadanti vividhāni citrāṇi ca harṣa jātāḥ

original: datvā ca bodhāya janenti vīryaṃ dānena te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.40 //
analyzed: da tvā ca bodhāya janenti vīryam dānena te prasthita agra bodhim

original: dharmaṃ ca kecit pravadanti śāntaṃ dṛṣṭāntahetūnayutairanekaiḥ /
analyzed: dharmam ca kecid pravadanti śāntam dṛṣṭānta hetūn ayutaiḥ anekaiḥ

original: deśenti te prāṇasahasrakoṭināṃ jñānena te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.41 //
analyzed: deśenti te prāṇa sahasra koṭinām jñānena te prasthita agra bodhim

original: nirīhakā dharma prajānamānā dvayaṃ pravṛttāḥ khagatulyasādṛśāḥ /
analyzed: nirīhakāḥ dvayam pravṛttāḥ khaga tulya sādṛśāḥ

original: anopaliptāḥ sugatasya putrāḥ prajñāya te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.42 //
analyzed: anopaliptāḥ sugatasya putrāḥ prajñāya te prasthita agra bodhim

original: bhūyaśca paśyāmyahu mañjughoṣa parinirvṛtānāṃ sugatāna śāsane /
analyzed: bhūyas ca paśyāmi ahu mañjughoṣa parinirvṛtānām śāsane

original: utpanna dhīrā bahubodhisattvāḥ kurvanti satkāru jināna dhātuṣu // Saddhp_1.43 //
analyzed: dhīrāḥ bahu bodhisattvāḥ kurvanti dhātuṣu

original: stūpāna paśyāmi sahasrakoṭyo analpakā yathariva gaṅgavālikāḥ /
analyzed: paśyāmi sahasra koṭyaḥ analpakāḥ gaṅga vālikāḥ

original: yebhiḥ sadā maṇḍita kṣetrakoṭiyo ye kāritā tehi jinātmajehi // Saddhp_1.44 //
analyzed: yebhiḥ sadā kṣetra koṭiyaḥ ye kāritā tehi jina ātmajehi

original: (Vaidya 10)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ratnāna saptāna viśiṣṭa ucchritāḥ sahasra pañco paripūrṇa yojanā /
analyzed: ratnāna saptāna viśiṣṭa ucchritāḥ sahasra pañco paripūrṇa yojanā

original: dve co sahasre pariṇāhavantaśchatradhvajāsteṣu sahasrakoṭayaḥ // Saddhp_1.45 //
analyzed: dve sahasre pariṇāhavantaḥ chatra dhvajāḥ teṣu sahasra koṭayaḥ

original: savaijayantāḥ sada śobhamānā ghaṇṭāsamūhai raṇamāna nityam /
analyzed: sa vaijayantāḥ sada śobhamānāḥ ghaṇṭā samūhaiḥ raṇamāna nityam

original: puṣpaiśca gandhaiśca tathaiva vādyaiḥ saṃpūjitā naramaruyakṣarākṣasaiḥ // Saddhp_1.46 //
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ ca gandhaiḥ ca tathā eva vādyaiḥ saṃpūjitā nara maru yakṣa rākṣasaiḥ

original: kārāpayantī sugatasya putrā jināna dhātuṣviha pūjamīdṛśīm /
analyzed: kārāpayantī sugatasya putrāḥ dhātuṣu iha pūjam īdṛśīm

original: yebhirdiśāyo daśa śobhitā yaḥ supuṣpitairvā yatha pārijātaiḥ // Saddhp_1.47 //
analyzed: yebhiḥ daśa śobhitāḥ yaḥ su puṣpitaiḥ vā pārijātaiḥ

original: ahaṃ cimāśco bahuprāṇakoṭya iha sthitāḥ paśyiṣu sarvametat /
analyzed: aham bahu prāṇa koṭyaḥ iha sthitāḥ paśyiṣu sarvam etat

original: prapuṣpitaṃ lokamimaṃ sadevakaṃ jinena muktā iyamekaraśmiḥ // Saddhp_1.48 //
analyzed: prapuṣpitam lokam imam sa devakam jinena muktā iyam eka raśmiḥ

original: aho prabhāvaḥ puruṣarṣabhasya aho 'sya jñānaṃ vipulaṃ anāsravam /
analyzed: aho prabhāvaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhasya aho sya jñānam vipulam anāsravam

original: yasyaikaraśmiḥ prasṛtādya loke darśeti kṣetrāṇa bahū sahasrān // Saddhp_1.49 //
analyzed: yasya eka raśmiḥ prasṛtā adya loke bahū sahasrān

original: āścaryaprāptāḥ sma nimitta dṛṣṭvā imamīdṛśaṃ cādbhutamaprameyam /
analyzed: āścarya prāptāḥ sma nimitta dṛṣṭvā imam īdṛśam ca adbhutam aprameyam

original: vadasva mañjusvara etamarthaṃ kautūhalaṃ hyapanaya buddhaputra // Saddhp_1.50 //
analyzed: vadasva mañjusvara etam artham kautūhalam hi apanaya buddha putra

original: catvārimā parṣa udagracittāstvāṃ cābhivīkṣantiha māṃ ca vīra /
analyzed: catvāri imā udagra cittāḥ tvām ca abhivīkṣanti iha mām ca vīra

original: janehi harṣaṃ vyapanehi kāṅkṣāṃ tvaṃ vyākarohī sugatasya putra // Saddhp_1.51 //
analyzed: janehi harṣam vyapanehi kāṅkṣām tvam vyākarohi sugatasya putra

original: kimarthameṣaḥ sugatena adya prabhāsa etādṛśako vimuktaḥ /
analyzed: kimartham eṣaḥ sugatena adya prabhāse etādṛśakaḥ vimuktaḥ

original: (Vaidya 11)
analyzed: vaidya

original: aho prabhāvaḥ puruṣarṣabhasya aho 'sya jñānaṃ vipulaṃ viśuddham // Saddhp_1.52 //
analyzed: aho prabhāvaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhasya aho sya jñānam vipulam viśuddham

original: yasyaikaraśmī prasṛtādya loke darśeti kṣetrāṇa bahūn sahasrān /
analyzed: yasya eka raśmī prasṛtā adya loke bahūn sahasrān

original: etādṛśo artha ayaṃ bhaviṣyati yenaiṣa raśmī vipulā pramuktā // Saddhp_1.53 //
analyzed: etādṛśaḥ artha ayam bhaviṣyati yena eṣa vipulā pramuktā

original: ye agradharmā sugatena spṛṣṭāstada bodhimaṇḍe puruṣottamena /
analyzed: ye sugatena bodhimaṇḍe puruṣottamena

original: kiṃ teha nirdekṣyati lokanātho atha vyākariṣyatyayu bodhisattvān // Saddhp_1.54 //
analyzed: kim tā iha nirdekṣyati lokanāthaḥ atha vyākariṣyati bodhisattvān

original: analpakaṃ kāraṇametta bheṣyati yaddarśitāḥ kṣetrasahasra neke /
analyzed: analpakam yat darśitāḥ kṣetra sahasra na eke

original: sucitracitrā ratanopaśobhitā buddhāśca dṛśyanti anantacakṣuṣaḥ // Saddhp_1.55 //
analyzed: su citra citrāḥ ratana upaśobhitāḥ buddhāḥ ca dṛśyanti ananta cakṣuṣaḥ

original: pṛccheti maitreyu jinasya putra spṛhenti te naramaruyakṣarākṣasāḥ /
analyzed: pṛccha iti jinasya putra spṛhenti te nara maru yakṣa rākṣasāḥ

original: catvārimā parṣa udīkṣamāṇā mañjusvaraḥ kiṃ nviha vyākariṣyati // Saddhp_1.56 //
analyzed: catvāri imā udīkṣamāṇāḥ mañjusvaraḥ kim nu iha vyākariṣyati

original: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ maitreyam bodhisattvam mahāsattvam tam ca sarvāvantam

original: bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma - mahādharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyamidaṃ kulaputrāstathāgatasya kartumabhiprāyaḥ,
analyzed: bodhisattva gaṇam āmantrayate sma mahā dharma śravaṇa sāṃkathyam idam kula putrāḥ tathāgatasya kartum abhiprāyaḥ

original: mahādharmavṛṣṭhayabhipravarṣaṇaṃ ca mahādharmadundubhisaṃpravādanaṃ ca mahādharmadhvajasamucchrayaṇaṃ
analyzed: mahā dharma vṛṣṭhaya abhipravarṣaṇam ca mahā dharma dundubhi saṃpravādanam ca mahā dharma dhvaja samucchrayaṇam

original: ca mahādharmolkāsaṃprajvālanaṃ ca mahādharmaśaṅkhābhiprapūraṇaṃ ca mahādharmabherīparāhaṇanaṃ
analyzed: ca mahā dharma ulkā saṃprajvālanam ca mahā dharma śaṅkha abhiprapūraṇam ca mahā dharma bherī parāhaṇanam

original: ca mahādharmanirdeśaṃ ca adya kulaputrāstathāgatasya kartumabhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: ca mahā dharma nirdeśam ca adya kula putrāḥ tathāgatasya kartum abhiprāyaḥ

original: yathā mama kulaputrāḥ pratibhāti,
analyzed: yathā mama kula putrāḥ pratibhāti

original: yathā ca mayā pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmidamevaṃrūpaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭamabhūt,
analyzed: yathā ca mayā pūrvakāṇām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām idam evaṃrūpam pūrva nimittam dṛṣṭam abhūt

original: teṣāmapi pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃ raśmipramocanāvabhāso 'bhut /
analyzed: teṣām api pūrvakāṇām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām evam raśmi pramocana avabhāsaḥ bhuj

original: tenaivaṃ prajānāmi - mahādharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyaṃ tathāgataḥ kartukāmo mahādharmaśravaṇaṃ śrāvayitukāmaḥ,
analyzed: tena evam prajānāmi mahā dharma śravaṇa sāṃkathyam tathāgataḥ kartu kāmaḥ mahā dharma śravaṇam śrāvayitu kāmaḥ

original: yathedamevaṃrūpaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ prāduṣkṛtavān /
analyzed: yathā idam evaṃrūpam pūrva nimittam prāduṣkṛtavān

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sarvalokavipratyanīyakadharmaparyāyaṃ śrāvayitukāmastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
analyzed: sarva loka vipratyanīyaka dharma paryāyam śrāvayitu kāmaḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: yathedamevaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ raśmipramocanāvabhāsaṃ ca pūrvanimittamupadarśayati //
analyzed: yathā idam evaṃrūpam mahā prātihāryam raśmi pramocana avabhāsam ca pūrva nimittam upadarśayati

original: anusmarāmyahaṃ kulaputrā atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairvipulairaprameyairacintyairaparimitairapramāṇaistataḥpareṇa
analyzed: anusmarāmi aham kula putrāḥ atīte dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ asaṃkhyeyataraiḥ vipulaiḥ aprameyaiḥ acintyaiḥ aparimitaiḥ apramāṇaiḥ tatas pareṇa

original: parataraṃ yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena candrasūryapradīpo nāma (Vaidya 12)
analyzed: parataram yadā āsīt tena kālena tena samayena candrasūryapradīpaḥ nāma vaidya

original: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca  #
analyzed: tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke udapādi vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca

original: buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: sa dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
analyzed: sa dharmam deśayati smaḥ ādau kalyāṇam madhye kalyāṇam paryavasāne kalyāṇam

original: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
analyzed: su artham su vyañjanam kevalam paripūrṇam pariśuddham paryavadātam brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma

original: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
analyzed: yat uta śrāvakāṇām catur ārya satya saṃprayuktam pratītyasamutpāda pravṛttam dharmam deśayati

original: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma
analyzed: bodhisattvānām ca mahāsattvānām ca ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktam anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim ārabhya sarvajña jñāna paryavasānam dharmam deśayati sma

analyzed: tasya khalu punar kula putrāḥ candrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya

analyzed: pareṇa parataram candrasūryapradīpe eva nāmnā tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke udapādi

original: iti hi ajita etena paraṃparodāhāreṇa candrasūryapradīpanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ
analyzed: iti hi ajitaḥ etena paraṃparā udāhāreṇa candrasūryapradīpa nāmakānām tathāgatānām arhatām

analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhānām eka nāmadheyānām a kekula gotrāṇām yat idam bharadvāja sagotrāṇām viṃśati tathāgata sahasrāṇi abhūvan

original: tatra ajita teṣāṃ viṃśatitathāgatasahasrāṇāṃ pūrvakaṃ tathāgatamupādāya yāvat paścimakastathāgataḥ,
analyzed: tatra ajita teṣām viṃśati tathāgata sahasrāṇām pūrvakam tathāgatam upādāya yāvat paścimakaḥ tathāgataḥ

original: so 'pi candrasūryapradīpanāmadheya eva tathāgato 'bhūdarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
analyzed: saḥ pi candrasūryapradīpa nāmadheyaḥ eva tathāgataḥ bhūt arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ

original: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: so 'pi dharmaṃ deśitavān ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
analyzed: saḥ pi dharmam deśitavān ādau kalyāṇam madhye kalyāṇam paryavasāne kalyāṇam

original: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
analyzed: su artham su vyañjanam kevalam paripūrṇam pariśuddham paryavadātam brahmacaryam saṃprakāśitavān

original: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃyuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśitavān
analyzed: yat uta śrāvakāṇām catur ārya satya saṃyuktam pratītyasamutpāda pravṛttam dharmam deśitavān

original: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsānāṃ samatikramāya nirvāṇaparyavasānam /
analyzed: jāti jarā vyādhi maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsānām samatikramāya nirvāṇa paryavasānam

original: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharma deśitavān //
analyzed: bodhisattvānām ca mahāsattvānām ca ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktam anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim ārabhya sarvajña jñāna paryavasānam dharma deśitavān

original: tasya khalu punarajita bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvaṃ kumārabhūtasyānabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsasya  #
analyzed: tasya khalu punar ajita bhagavataḥ candrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvam kumāra bhūtasya an abhiniṣkrānta gṛha āvāsasya

original: aṣṭau putrā abhūvan /
analyzed: aṣṭau putrāḥ abhūvan

original: tadyathā - matiśca nāma rājakumāro 'bhūt /

original: sarvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pracacāla tatkṣaṇam āścaryamatyadbhutamāsi tatra /
analyzed: sarvam ca kṣetram pracacāla tad kṣaṇam āścaryam ati adbhutam āsi tatra

original: raśmiṃ ca ekāṃ pramumoca nāyako bhruvāntarāttāmatidarśanīyām // Saddhp_1.63 //
analyzed: raśmim ca ekām pramumoca nāyakaḥ bhruvā antarāt tām ati darśanīyām

original: pūrvāṃ ca gatvā diśa sā hi raśmiraṣṭādaśakṣetrasahasra pūrṇā /
analyzed: pūrvām ca gatvā sā hi raśmiḥ aṣṭādaśa kṣetra sahasra pūrṇā

original: prabhāsayaṃ bhrājati sarvalokaṃ darśeti sattvāna cyutopapādam // Saddhp_1.64 //
analyzed: bhrājati sarva lokam cyuta upapādam

original: ratnāmayā kṣetra tathātra kecidvaiḍūryanirbhāsa tathaiva kecit /
analyzed: ratna āmayāḥ tathā atra kecid vaiḍūrya nirbhāsa tathā eva kecid

original: dṛśyanti citrā atidarśanīyā raśmiprabhāsena vināyakasya // Saddhp_1.65 //
analyzed: dṛśyanti citrāḥ atidarśanīyāḥ raśmi prabhāsena vināyakasya

original: devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
analyzed: devāḥ manuṣyāḥ tathā nāga yakṣāḥ gandharva tatra apsara kinnarāḥ ca

original: (Vaidya 16)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ye cābhiyuktāḥ sugatasya pūjayā dṛśyanti pūjenti ca lokadhātuṣu // Saddhp_1.66 //
analyzed: ye ca abhiyuktāḥ sugatasya pūjayā dṛśyanti ca lokadhātuṣu

original: buddhāśca dṛśyanti svayaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ suvarṇayūpā iva darśanīyāḥ /
analyzed: buddhāḥ ca dṛśyanti svayam svayaṃbhuvaḥ suvarṇa yūpāḥ iva darśanīyāḥ

original: vaiḍūryamadhye ca suvarṇabimbaṃ parṣāya madhye pravadanti dharmam // Saddhp_1.67 //
analyzed: vaiḍūrya madhye ca suvarṇa bimbam madhye pravadanti dharmam

original: tahi śrāvakāṇāṃ gaṇanā na vidyate te cāpramāṇāḥ sugatasya śrāvakāḥ /
analyzed: tahi śrāvakāṇām gaṇanā na vidyate te ca apramāṇāḥ sugatasya śrāvakāḥ

original: ekaikakṣetrasmi vināyakānāṃ raśmiprabhā darśayate hi sarvān // Saddhp_1.68 //
analyzed: vināyakānām raśmi prabhā darśayate hi sarvān

original: vīryairupetāśca akhaṇḍaśīlā acchidraśīlā maṇiratnasādṛśāḥ /
analyzed: vīryaiḥ upetāḥ ca akhaṇḍa śīlāḥ acchidra śīlāḥ maṇi ratna sādṛśāḥ

original: dṛśyanti putrā naranāyakānāṃ viharanti ye parvatakandareṣu // Saddhp_1.69 //
analyzed: dṛśyanti putrāḥ nara nāyakānām viharanti ye parvata kandareṣu

original: sarvasvadānāni parityajantaḥ kṣāntībalā dhyānaratāśca dhīrāḥ /
analyzed: sarva sva dānāni parityajantaḥ kṣāntī balāḥ dhyāna ratāḥ ca dhīrāḥ

original: bahubodhisattvā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ sarve 'pi dṛśyanti tayā hi raśmyā // Saddhp_1.70 //
analyzed: bahu bodhisattvāḥ gaṅga vālikāḥ sarve pi dṛśyanti tayā hi raśmyā

original: aniñjamānāśca avedhamānāḥ kṣāntau sthitā dhyānaratāḥ samāhitāḥ /
analyzed: an iñjamānāḥ ca a vedhamānāḥ kṣāntau sthitāḥ dhyāna ratāḥ samāhitāḥ

original: dṛśyanti putrāḥ sugatasya aurasā dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.71 //
analyzed: dṛśyanti putrāḥ sugatasya aurasāḥ dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim

original: bhūtaṃ padaṃ śāntamanāsravaṃ ca prajānamānāśca prakāśayanti /
analyzed: bhūtam padam śāntam anāsravam ca prajānamānāḥ ca prakāśayanti

original: deśenti dharmaṃ bahulokadhātuṣu sugatānubhāvādiyamīdṛśī kriyā // Saddhp_1.72 //
analyzed: deśenti dharmam bahu lokadhātuṣu sugata anubhāvāt iyam īdṛśī kriyā

original: dṛṣṭvā ca tā parṣa catasra tāyinaścandrārkadīpasya imaṃ prabhāvam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tā catasraḥ tāyinaḥ candra arka dīpasya imam prabhāvam

original: harṣasthitāḥ sarvi bhavitva tatkṣaṇamanyonya pṛcchanti kathaṃ nu etat // Saddhp_1.73 //
analyzed: harṣa sthitāḥ tad kṣaṇam anyonya pṛcchanti katham nu etat

original: (Vaidya 17)
analyzed: vaidya

original: acirācca so naramaruyakṣapūjitaḥ samādhito vyutthita lokanāyakaḥ /
analyzed: acirāt ca saḥ nara maru yakṣa pūjitaḥ samādhitaḥ vyutthita loka nāyakaḥ

original: varaprabhaṃ putra tadādhyabhāṣata yo bodhisattvo vidu dharmabhāṇakaḥ // Saddhp_1.74 //
analyzed: varaprabham putra tadā adhyabhāṣata yaḥ bodhisattvaḥ dharma bhāṇakaḥ

original: lokasya cakṣuśca gatiśca tvaṃ vidurvaiśvāsiko dharmadharaśca mahyam /
analyzed: lokasya cakṣuḥ ca gatiḥ ca tvam viduḥ vaiśvāsikaḥ dharma dharaḥ ca mahyam

original: tvaṃ hyatra sākṣī mama dharmakośe yathāhu bhāṣiṣyi hitāya prāṇinām // Saddhp_1.75 //
analyzed: tvam hi atra sākṣī mama dharma kośe yathā āhu bhāṣiṣyi hitāya prāṇinām

original: saṃsthāpayitvā bahubodhisattvān harṣitva saṃvarṇiya saṃstavitvā /
analyzed: saṃsthāpayitvā bahu bodhisattvān saṃvarṇiya saṃstavitvā

original: prabhāṣate tajjina agradharmān paripūrṇa so antarakalpa ṣaṣṭim // Saddhp_1.76 //
analyzed: prabhāṣate tad jina agra dharmān paripūrṇa saḥ antara kalpa ṣaṣṭim

original: yaṃ caiva so bhāṣati lokanātho ekāsanasthaḥ pravarāgradharmam /
analyzed: yam ca eva saḥ bhāṣati loka nāthaḥ eka āsana sthaḥ pravara agra dharmam

original: taṃ sarvamādhārayi so jinātmajo varaprabho yo abhu dharmabhāṇakaḥ // Saddhp_1.77 //
analyzed: tam sarvam ādhārayi saḥ jina ātmajaḥ vara prabhaḥ yaḥ dharma bhāṇakaḥ

original: so co jino bhāṣiya agradharmaṃ praharṣayitvā janatāmanekām /
analyzed: saḥ caḥ jinaḥ agra dharmam praharṣayitvā janatām anekām

original: tasmiṃśca divase vadate sa nāyakaḥ purato hi lokasya sadevakasya // Saddhp_1.78 //
analyzed: tasmin ca divase vadate sa nāyakaḥ puratas hi lokasya sa devakasya

original: prakāśitā me iya dharmanetrī ācakṣito dharmasvabhāva yādṛaśaḥ /
analyzed: prakāśitā me iya dharma netrī ācakṣitaḥ dharma svabhāva yādṛaśaḥ

original: nirvāṇakālo mama adya bhikṣavo rātrīya yāmasmiha madhyamasmin // Saddhp_1.79 //
analyzed: nirvāṇa kālaḥ mama adya bhikṣavaḥ yāmasmin iha madhyamasmin

original: bhavathāpramattā adhimuktisārā abhiyujyathā mahya imasmi śāsane /
analyzed: bhavatha apramattāḥ adhimukti sārāḥ abhiyujyathāḥ mahye imasmi śāsane

original: sudurlabhā bhonti jinā maharṣayaḥ kalpāna koṭīnayutāna atyayāt // Saddhp_1.80 //
analyzed: su durlabhāḥ bhonti jināḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ kalpāna koṭī nayutāna atyayāt

original: saṃtāpajātā bahubuddhaputrā duḥkhena cogreṇa samarpitābhavan /
analyzed: saṃtāpa jātāḥ bahu buddha putrāḥ duḥkhena ca ugreṇa samarpitāḥ abhavan

original: (Vaidya 18)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: ghoṣam dvipada uttamasya nirvāṇa śabdam ati kṣipram etat

original: āśvāsayitvā ca narendrarājā tāḥ prāṇakoṭyo bahavo acintiyāḥ /
analyzed: āśvāsayitvā ca narendra rājā tāḥ prāṇa koṭyaḥ bahavaḥ acintiyāḥ

original: mā bhāyathā bhikṣava nirvṛte mayi bhaviṣyatha buddha mamottareṇa // Saddhp_1.82 //
analyzed: mā bhāyathāḥ bhikṣava nirvṛte mayi bhaviṣyatha buddha mama uttareṇa

original: śrīgarbha eṣo vidu bodhisattvo gatiṃ gato jñāni anāsravasmin /
analyzed: śrī garbhaḥ eṣaḥ vidu bodhisattvaḥ gatim gataḥ jñāni anāsravasmin

original: spṛśiṣyate uttamamagrabodhiṃ vimalāgranetro ti jino bhaviṣyati // Saddhp_1.83 //
analyzed: spṛśiṣyate uttamam agra bodhim vimala agra netraḥ ti jinaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tāmeva rātriṃ tada yāmi madhyame parinirvṛto hetukṣaye va dīpaḥ /
analyzed: tām eva rātrim yāmi madhyame parinirvṛtaḥ hetu kṣaye dīpaḥ

original: śarīra vaistāriku tasya cābhūt stūpāna koṭīnayutā anantakā // Saddhp_1.84 //
analyzed: tasya tasya

original: bhikṣuśca tatrā tatha bhikṣuṇīyo ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
analyzed: bhikṣuḥ ca tatra bhikṣuṇīyaḥ ye prasthitāḥ uttamam agra bodhim

original: analpakāste yatha gaṅgabālikā abhiyukta tasyo sugatasya śāsane // Saddhp_1.85 //
analyzed: analpakāḥ te gaṅgabālikāḥ

original: yaścāpi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇako varaprabho yena sa dharma dhāritaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca api dharma bhāṇakaḥ vara prabhaḥ yena sa dharma dhāritaḥ

original: aśīti so antarakalpa pūrṇāṃ tahi śāsane bhāṣati agradharmān // Saddhp_1.86 //
analyzed: saḥ antara kalpa pūrṇām śāsane bhāṣati agra dharmān

original: aṣṭāśataṃ tasya abhūṣi śiṣyāḥ paripācitā ye tada tena sarve /
analyzed: aṣṭāśatam tasya śiṣyāḥ paripācitāḥ ye tada tena sarve

analyzed: dṛṣṭā ca tebhiḥ bahu buddha koṭyaḥ teṣām ca kṛtaḥ mahā ṛṣiṇām

analyzed: caryām caritvā tadā ānulomikīm buddhāḥ abhūvan bahu lokadhātuṣu

original: parasparaṃ te ca anantareṇa anyonya vyākarṣu tadāgrabodhaye // Saddhp_1.88 //
analyzed: parasparam te ca anantareṇa anyonya

original: (Vaidya 19)
analyzed: vaidya

original: teṣāṃ ca buddhāna paraṃpareṇa dīpaṃkaraḥ paścimako abhūṣi /
analyzed: teṣām ca paraṃpareṇa dīpaṃkaraḥ paścimakaḥ

analyzed: devātidevaḥ ṛṣi saṃgha pūjitaḥ vinītavān prāṇi sahasra koṭyaḥ

original: yaścāsi tasyo sugatātmajasya varaprabhasyo tada dharma bhāṣataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca asi tasya sugata ātmajasya varaprabhasya dharma bhāṣataḥ

analyzed: śiṣyaḥ kusīdaḥ ca sa lolupa ātmā lābham ca jñānam ca gaveṣamāṇaḥ

analyzed: yaśaḥ ṛthikaḥ ca api atimātraḥ āsīt kula ākulam ca pratipannam āsīt

analyzed: sarvaḥ na tiṣṭhate tasmi kāle

analyzed: sa ca api tena akuśalena karmaṇā kalmāṣa bhūtena abhisaṃskṛtena

analyzed: ārāgayī buddha sahasra koṭyaḥ pūjām ca teṣām vipulām akārṣīt

analyzed: cīrṇā ca caryā varaḥ ānulomikī dṛṣṭaḥ ca buddhaḥ śākyasiṃhaḥ

analyzed: ayam ca saḥ paścimakaḥ bhaviṣyati anuttarām lapsyati ca agra bodhim

analyzed: maitreya gotraḥ bhagavān bhaviṣyati vineṣyati prāṇa sahasra koṭyaḥ

analyzed: kausīdya prāptaḥ tada yaḥ babhūva parinirvṛtasya sugatasya śāsane

analyzed: tvam eva tādṛśakaḥ babhūva aham ca āsīt tadā dharma bhāṇakaḥ

analyzed: imena ham kāraṇa hetunā adya dṛṣṭvā nimittam idam evarūpam

analyzed: jñānasya tasya prathitam nimittam prathamam mayā tatra vadāmi dṛṣṭam

original: (Vaidya 20)
analyzed: vaidya

original: dhruvaṃ jinendro 'pi samantacakṣuḥ śākyādhirājaḥ paramārthadarśī /
analyzed: dhruvam samanta cakṣuḥ śākya adhirājaḥ parama artha darśī

analyzed: tam eva yam icchati bhāṣaṇāya paryāyam agram tad adyaḥ mayā śrutaḥ

original: tadeva paripūrṇa nimittamadya upāyakauśalya vināyakānām /
analyzed: tat eva paripūrṇa nimittam adya upāya kauśalya vināyakānām

analyzed: saṃsthāpanam kurvati śākyasiṃhaḥ bhāṣiṣyate dharma svabhāva mudrām

analyzed: prayatā su cittāḥ bhavathā kṛtāñjalī bhāṣiṣyate loka hita anukampī

original: varṣiṣyate dharmamanantavarṣaṃ tarpiṣyate ye sthita bodhihetoḥ // Saddhp_1.99 //
analyzed: varṣiṣyate dharmam ananta varṣam tarpiṣyate ye sthita bodhi hetoḥ

original: yeṣāṃ ca saṃdehagatīha kācid ye saṃśayā yā vicikitsa kācit /
analyzed: yeṣām ca saṃdeha gatī iha kācid ye saṃśayāḥ yā kācid

analyzed: vyapaneṣyate tāḥ vidura ātmajānām ye bodhisattvāḥ iha bodhi prasthitāḥ

analyzed: iti ārya saddharmapuṇḍarīke dhama paryāye nidānaparivartaḥ nāma prathamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 21)
analyzed: vaidya

original: Saddhp_2: upāyakauśalyaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: upāya kauśalya parivartaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃstataḥ samādhervyutthitaḥ /
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānan tatas samādheḥ vyutthitaḥ

original: vyutthāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - gambhīraṃ śāriputra durdṛśaṃ duranubodhaṃ buddhajñānaṃ tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
analyzed: vyutthāya āyuṣmantam śāriputram āmantrayate sma gambhīram śāriputra durdṛśam duranubodham buddha jñānam tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ

original: durvijñeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ /
analyzed: durvijñeyam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: bahubuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāvino hi śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
analyzed: bahu buddha koṭī nayuta śata sahasra paryupāsitāvinaḥ hi śāriputra tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: bahubuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasracīrṇacaritāvino 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau dūrānugatāḥ
analyzed: bahu buddha koṭī nayuta śata sahasra cīrṇa caritāvinaḥ nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau dūra anugatāḥ

original: kṛtavīryā āścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgatā durvijñeyadharmasamanvāgatā durvijñeyadharmānujñātāvinaḥ //
analyzed: kṛtavīryāḥ āścarya adbhuta dharma samanvāgatāḥ durvijñeya dharma samanvāgatāḥ durvijñeya dharma anujñātāvinaḥ

original: durvijñeyaṃ śāriputra saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
analyzed: durvijñeyam śāriputra saṃdhā bhāṣyam tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: svapratyayān dharmān prakāśayanti vividhopāyakauśalyajñānadarśanahetukāraṇanirdeśanārambaṇaniruktiprajñaptibhistairupāyakauśalyaistasmiṃstasmiṃllagnān  #
analyzed: sva pratyayān dharmān prakāśayanti vividha upāya kauśalya jñāna darśana hetu kāraṇa nirdeśana ārambaṇa nirukti prajñaptibhiḥ taiḥ upāya kauśalyaiḥ tasmin tasmin lagnān

original: sattvān pramocayitum /
analyzed: sattvān pramocayitum

original: mahopāyakauśalyajñānadarśanaparamapāramitāprāptāḥ śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
analyzed: mahā upāya kauśalya jñāna darśana parama pāramitā prāptāḥ śāriputra tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ

original: asaṅgāpratihatajñānadarśanabalavaiśāradyāveṇikendriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyadbhutadharmasamanvāgatā vividhadharmasaṃprakāśakāḥ

original: sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti /
analyzed: sattvānām dharmam deśayiṣyanti

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra sattvāsteṣāmanāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt taṃ dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra sattvāḥ teṣām anāgatānām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām antikāt tam dharmam śroṣyanti

original: te 'pi sarve 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherlābhino bhaviṣyanti //
analyzed: te pi sarve nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ lābhinaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra etarhi pratyutpanne 'dhvani daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti  #
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra etarhi pratyutpanne dhvani daśasu dikṣu aprameyeṣu asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti  /

original: ghriyante yāpayanti,
analyzed: ghriyante yāpayanti

original: dharmaṃ ca deśayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanahitāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
analyzed: dharmam ca deśayanti bahu jana hitāya bahu jana hitāya loka anukampāyai mahataḥ jana kāyasya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca

original: ye nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ
analyzed: ye nānā abhinirhāra nirdeśa vividha hetu kāraṇa nidarśana ārambaṇa nirukti upāya kauśalyaiḥ nānā adhimuktānām sattvānām nānā dhātu āśayānām āśayam viditvā dharmam

original: te 'pi sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam,
analyzed: te pi sarve śāriputra buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ ekam eva yānam ārabhya sattvānām dharmam deśayanti yat idam buddha yānam sarvajña tā paryavasānam

original: yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanameva sattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasaṃdarśanameva
analyzed: yat idam tathāgata jñāna darśana samādāpanam eva sattvānām tathāgata jñāna darśana saṃdarśanam eva

original: tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇameva tathāgatajñānadarśanapratibodhanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanamārgāvatāraṇameva
analyzed: tathāgata jñāna darśana avatāraṇam eva tathāgata jñāna darśana pratibodhanam eva tathāgata jñāna darśana mārga avatāraṇam eva

original: sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
analyzed: sattvānām dharmam deśayanti

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra sattvāsteṣāṃ pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra sattvāḥ teṣām pratyutpannānām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām antikāt tam dharmam śṛṇvanti

original: te 'pi sarve 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherlābhino bhaviṣyanti //
analyzed: te pi sarve nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ lābhinaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ahamapi śāriputra etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya
analyzed: aham api śāriputra etarhi tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya

original: lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ
analyzed: loka anukampāyai mahataḥ jana kāyasya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca nānā abhinirhāra nirdeśa vividha hetu kāraṇa nidarśana ārambaṇa nirukti upāya kauśalyaiḥ nānā adhimuktānām

original: sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
analyzed: sattvānām nānā dhātu āśayānām āśayam viditvā dharmam deśayāmi

original: ahamapi śāriputra ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam,
analyzed: aham api śāriputra ekam eva yānam ārabhya sattvānām dharmam deśayāmi yat idam buddha yānam sarvajña tā paryavasānam

original: yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanameva sattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasaṃdarśanameva
analyzed: yat idam tathāgata jñāna darśana samādāpanam eva sattvānām tathāgata jñāna darśana saṃdarśanam eva

original: tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇameva tathāgatajñānadarśanapratibodhanameva tathāgatajñānadarśanamārgāvatāraṇameva
analyzed: tathāgata jñāna darśana avatāraṇam eva tathāgata jñāna darśana pratibodhanam eva tathāgata jñāna darśana mārga avatāraṇam eva

original: sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
analyzed: sattvānām dharmam deśayāmi

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra sattvā etarhi mamemaṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra sattvāḥ etarhi mama imam dharmam śṛṇvanti

original: te 'pi sarve 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherlābhino bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: te pi sarve nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ lābhinaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: tadanenāpi śāriputra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā nāsti dvitīyasya yānasya kvaciddaśasu dikṣu loke prajñaptiḥ,
analyzed: tat anena api śāriputra paryāyeṇa evam veditavyam yathā na asti dvitīyasya yānasya kvacid daśasu dikṣu loke prajñaptiḥ

original: kutaḥ punastṛtīyasya //
analyzed: kutas punar tṛtīyasya

original: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra yadā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā kalpakaṣāye (Vaidya 29)
analyzed: api tu khalu punar śāriputra yadā tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā kalpa kaṣāye vaidya

original: votpadyante sattvakaṣāye vā kleśakaṣāye vā dṛṣṭikaṣāye vā āyuṣkaṣāye votpadyante /
analyzed: vā utpadyante sattva kaṣāye vā kleśa kaṣāye vā dṛṣṭi kaṣāye vā āyuḥ kaṣāye vā utpadyante

original: evaṃrūpeṣu śāriputra kalpasaṃkṣobhakaṣāyeṣu bahusattveṣu lubdheṣvalpakuśalamūleṣu
analyzed: evaṃrūpeṣu śāriputra kalpa saṃkṣobha kaṣāyeṣu bahu sattveṣu lubdheṣu alpa kuśala mūleṣu

original: tadā śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā upāyakauśalyena tadevaikaṃ buddhayānaṃ
analyzed: tadā śāriputra tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ upāya kauśalyena tat eva ekam buddha yānaṃ

original: triyānanirdeśena nirdiśanti /
analyzed: triyāna nirdeśena nirdiśanti

original: tatra śāriputra ye śrāvakā arhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā vā imāṃ kriyāṃ tathāgatasya buddhayānasamādapanāṃ na śṛṇvanti nāvataranti nāvabudhyanti,
analyzed: tatra śāriputra ye śrāvakāḥ arhantaḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ vā imām kriyām tathāgatasya buddha yāna samādapanām na śṛṇvanti na avataranti na avabudhyanti

original: na te śāriputra tathāgatasya śrāvakā veditavyāḥ,
analyzed: na te śāriputra tathāgatasya śrāvakāḥ veditavyāḥ

original: nāpyarhanto nāpi pratyekabuddhā veditavyāḥ /
analyzed: na api arhantaḥ na api pratyekabuddhāḥ veditavyāḥ

original: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra yaḥ kaścid bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā arhattvaṃ pratijānīyāt,
analyzed: api tu khalu punar śāriputra yaḥ kaścid bhikṣuḥ vā bhikṣuṇī vā arhat tvam pratijānīyāt

original: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānamaparigṛhya ucchinno 'smi buddhayānāditi vadet,
analyzed: anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānam a parigṛhya ucchinnaḥ smi buddha yānāt iti vadet

original: etāvanme samucchrayasya paścimakaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vadet,
analyzed: etāvat me samucchrayasya paścimakam parinirvāṇam vadet

original: ābhimānikaṃ taṃ śāriputra prajānīyāḥ /
analyzed: ābhimānikam tam śāriputra prajānīyāḥ

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: asthānametacchāriputra anavakāśo yadbhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsravaḥ saṃmukhībhūte tathāgate imaṃḥ dharmaṃ śrutvā na śraddadhyāt sthāpayitvā parinirvṛtasya  #
analyzed: asthānam etat śāriputra anavakāśaḥ yat bhikṣuḥ arhan kṣīṇa āsravaḥ saṃmukhībhūte tathāgate iman dharmam śrutvā na śraddadhyāt sthāpayitvā parinirvṛtasya  /

original: tathāgatasya /
analyzed: tathāgatasya

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śāriputra śrāvakāstasmin kāle tasmin samaye parinirvṛte tathāgate eteṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ dhārakā vā deśakā vā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: na hi śāriputra śrāvakāḥ tasmin kāle tasmin samaye parinirvṛte tathāgate eteṣām evaṃrūpāṇām sūtrāntānām dhārakāḥ vā deśakāḥ vā bhaviṣyanti

original: anyeṣu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu niḥsaṃśayā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: anyeṣu punar śāriputra tathāgateṣu arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu niḥsaṃśayāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: imeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śraddadhādhvaṃ me śāriputra pattīyata avakalpayata /
analyzed: imeṣu buddha dharmeṣu me śāriputra avakalpayata

original: na hi śāriputra tathāgatānāṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃvidyate /
analyzed: na hi śāriputra tathāgatānām mṛṣāvādaḥ saṃvidyate

original: ekamevedaṃ śāriputra yānaṃ yadidaṃ buddhayānam //
analyzed: ekam eva idam śāriputra yānam yat idam buddha yānam

original: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān etam eva artham bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānaḥ tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: athābhimānaprāptā ye bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakāḥ /
analyzed: atha abhimāna prāptāḥ ye bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsakāḥ

original: upāsikāśca aśrāddhāḥ sahasrāḥ pañcanūnakāḥ // Saddhp_2.38 //
analyzed: upāsikāḥ ca aśrāddhāḥ sahasrāḥ pañca nūnakāḥ

original: apaśyanta imaṃ doṣaṃ chidraśikṣāsamanvitāḥ /
analyzed: a paśyantaḥ imam doṣam chidra śikṣā samanvitāḥ

original: vraṇāṃśca parirakṣantaḥ prakrāntā bālabuddhayaḥ // Saddhp_2.39 //
analyzed: vraṇān ca parirakṣantaḥ prakrāntāḥ bāla buddhayaḥ

original: parṣatkaṣāyatāṃ jñātvā lokanātho 'dhivāsayi /
analyzed: parṣad kaṣāya tām jñātvā loka nāthaḥ

original: tatteṣāṃ kuśalaṃ nāsti śṛṇuyurdharma ye imam // Saddhp_2.40 //
analyzed: tat teṣām kuśalam nā asti śṛṇuyuḥ dharma ye imam

original: śuddhā ca niṣpalāvā ca susthitā pariṣanmama /
analyzed: śuddhā ca niṣpalāvā ca susthitā pariṣad mama

original: phalguvyapagatā sarvā sārā ceyaṃ pratiṣṭhitā // Saddhp_2.41 //
analyzed: phalgu vyapagatā sarvā sārā ca iyam pratiṣṭhitā

original: śṛṇohi me śārisutā yathaiṣa saṃbuddha dharmaḥ puruṣottamehi /
analyzed: śṛṇohi me śārisutā yathā eṣa saṃbuddha dharmaḥ puruṣottamehi

original: yathā ca buddhāḥ kathayanti nāyakā upāyakauśalyaśatairanekaiḥ // Saddhp_2.42 //
analyzed: yathā ca buddhāḥ kathayanti nāyakāḥ upāya kauśalya śataiḥ anekaiḥ

original: yathāśayaṃ jāniya te cariṃ ca nānādhimuktāniha prāṇakoṭinām /
analyzed: yathāśayam te carim ca nānā adhimuktān iha prāṇa koṭinām

original: (Vaidya 30)
analyzed: vaidya

original: citrāṇi karmāṇi viditva teṣāṃ purākṛtaṃ yatkuśalaṃ ca tehi // Saddhp_2.43 //
analyzed: citrāṇi karmāṇi teṣām purā kṛtam yat kuśalam ca te hi

original: nānāniruktīhi ca kāraṇehi saṃprāpayāmī ima teṣa prāṇinām /
analyzed: nānā niruktīhi ca kāraṇehi saṃprāpayāmi prāṇinām

original: hetūhi dṛṣṭāntaśatehi cāhaṃ tathā tathā toṣayi sarvasattvān // Saddhp_2.44 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta śatehi ca aham tathā tathā toṣayi sarva sattvān

original: sūtrāṇi bhāṣāmi tathaiva gāthā itivṛttakaṃ jātakamadbhutaṃ ca /
analyzed: sūtrāṇi bhāṣāmi tathā eva gāthāḥ itivṛttakam jātakam adbhutam ca

original: nidāna aupamyaśataiśca citrairgeyaṃ ca bhāṣāmi tathopadeśān // Saddhp_2.45 //
analyzed: nidāna aupamya śataiḥ ca citraiḥ geyam ca bhāṣāmi tathā upadeśān

original: ye bhonti hīnābhiratā avidvasū acīrṇacaryā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu /
analyzed: ye bhonti hīna abhiratāḥ a vidvasū a cīrṇa caryāḥ bahu buddha koṭiṣu

original: saṃsāralagnāśca suduḥkhitāśca nirvāṇa teṣāmupadarśayāmi // Saddhp_2.46 //
analyzed: saṃsāra lagnāḥ ca su duḥkhitāḥ ca nirvāṇa teṣām upadarśayāmi

original: upāyametaṃ kurute svayaṃbhūrbauddhasya jñānasya prabodhanārtham /
analyzed: upāyam etam kurute svayaṃbhūḥ bauddhasya jñānasya prabodhana artham

original: na cāpi teṣāṃ pravade kadācid yuṣme 'pi buddhā iha loki bheṣyatha // Saddhp_2.47 //
analyzed: na ca api teṣām pravade kadācid yuṣme buddhāḥ iha loki

original: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kālamavekṣya tāyī kṣaṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatu paśca bhāṣate /
analyzed: kim kāraṇam kālam avekṣya tāyī kṣaṇam ca dṛṣṭvā bhāṣate

original: so 'yaṃ kṣaṇo adya kathaṃci labdho vadāmi yeneha ca bhūtaniścayam // Saddhp_2.48 //
analyzed: saḥ yam kṣaṇaḥ adya kathaṃcid labdhaḥ vadāmi yena iha ca bhūta niścayam

original: navāṅgametanmama śāsanaṃ ca prakāśitaṃ sattvabalābalena /
analyzed: nava aṅgam etat mama śāsanam ca prakāśitam sattva balābalena

original: upāya eṣo varadasya jñāne praveśanārthāya nidarśito me // Saddhp_2.49 //
analyzed: upāyaḥ eṣaḥ vara dasya jñāne praveśana arthāya nidarśitaḥ me

original: bhavanti ye ceha sadā viśuddhā vyaktā śucī sūrata buddhaputrāḥ /
analyzed: bhavanti ye ca iha sadā viśuddhāḥ vyaktā śucī sūrata buddha putrāḥ

original: kṛtādhikārā bahubuddhakoṭiṣu vaipulyasūtrāṇi vadāmi teṣām // Saddhp_2.50 //
analyzed: kṛta adhikārāḥ bahu buddha koṭiṣu vaipulya sūtrāṇi vadāmi teṣām

original: (Vaidya 31)
analyzed: vaidya

original: tathā hi te āśayasaṃpadāya viśuddharūpāya samanvitābhūn /
analyzed: tathā hi te āśaya saṃpadāya viśuddha rūpāya samanvitāḥ abhūn

original: vadāmi tān buddha bhaviṣyatheti anāgate 'dhvāni hitānukampakāḥ // Saddhp_2.51 //
analyzed: vadāmi tān buddha bhaviṣyatha iti anāgate dhvāni hita anukampakāḥ

original: śrutvā ca prītisphuṭa bhonti sarve buddhā bhaviṣyāma jagatpradhānāḥ /
analyzed: śrutvā ca bhonti sarve buddhāḥ bhaviṣyāma jagat pradhānāḥ

original: punaśca haṃ jāniya teṣa caryāṃ vaipulyasūtrāṇi prakāśayāmi // Saddhp_2.52 //
analyzed: punar ca ham caryām vaipulya sūtrāṇi prakāśayāmi

original: ime ca te śrāvaka nāyakasya yehi śrutaṃ śāsanametamagryam /
analyzed: ime ca te śrāvaka nāyakasya yā ihi śrutam śāsanam etam agryam

original: ekāpi gāthā śruta dhāritā vā sarveṣa bodhāya na saṃśayo 'sti // Saddhp_2.53 //
analyzed: ekā api gāthā śruta dhāritā vā sarveṣa bodhāya na saṃśayaḥ sti

original: ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate tṛtiyaṃ hi naivāsti kadāci loke /
analyzed: ekam hi yānam dvitiyam na vidyate tṛtiyam hi na eva asti kadācid loke

original: anyatrupāyā puruṣottamānāṃ yadyānanānātvupadarśayanti // Saddhp_2.54 //
analyzed: anyatra upāyā puruṣa uttamānām

original: bauddhasya jñānasya prakāśanārthaṃ loke samutpadyati lokanāthaḥ /
analyzed: bauddhasya jñānasya prakāśana artham loke samutpadyati lokanāthaḥ

original: ekaṃ hi kāryaṃ dvitiyaṃ na vidyate na hīnayānena nayanti buddhāḥ // Saddhp_2.55 //
analyzed: ekam hi kāryam dvitiyam na vidyate na hīna yānena nayanti buddhāḥ

original: pratiṣṭhito yatra svayaṃ svayaṃbhūryaccaiva buddhaṃ yatha yādṛśaṃ ca /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhitaḥ yatra svayam svayaṃbhūḥ yat ca eva buddham yādṛśam ca

original: balāśca ye dhyānavimokṣa-indriyāstatraiva sattvā pi pratiṣṭhapeti // Saddhp_2.56 //
analyzed: balāḥ ca ye dhyāna vimokṣa aindriyāḥ tatra eva

original: mātsaryadoṣo hi bhaveta mahyaṃ spṛśitva bodhiṃ virajāṃ viśiṣṭām /
analyzed: mātsarya doṣaḥ hi bhaveta mahyam spṛśitva bodhim virajām viśiṣṭām

original: yadi hīnayānasmi pratiṣṭhapeyamekaṃ pi sattvaṃ na mamate sādhu // Saddhp_2.57 //
analyzed: yadi sattvam na mamate sādhu

original: mātsarya mahyaṃ na kahiṃci vidyate īrṣyā na me nāpi ca chandarāgaḥ /
analyzed: mātsarya mahyam na kahiṃci vidyate īrṣyā na me na api ca chanda rāgaḥ

original: (Vaidya 32)
analyzed: vaidya

original: ucchinna pāpā mama sarvadharmāstenāsmi buddho jagato 'nubodhāt // Saddhp_2.58 //
analyzed: ucchinna pāpāḥ mama sarva dharmāḥ tena asmi buddhaḥ jagataḥ

original: yathā hyahaṃ citritu lakṣaṇehi prabhāsayanto imu sarvalokam /
analyzed: yathā hi aham lakṣaṇehi prabhāsayantaḥ sarva lokam

analyzed: adhyoṣitāḥ kāma guṇeṣu saktāḥ tṛṣṇāya saṃmūrchita moha cittāḥ

analyzed: ekam tu yānam hi nayaḥ ca ekaḥ ekā nāyakānām

analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: kṣāntā ca dāntā ca vinīta tatra te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ

original: (Vaidya 35)

analyzed: uddiśya kārāpita yehi cāpi te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ

original: (Vaidya 36)

analyzed: ekotsavāḥ vā sukumārakāḥ vā te sarvi bodhāya lābhinaḥ

analyzed: sarve ca te loke tām bahuvidha dhātu pūjām

original: (Vaidya 37)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: vikṣipta cittaiḥ api eka vāram te sarvi prāptāḥ imam agra bodhim

analyzed: teṣām tasmi kāle parinirvṛtānām atha tiṣṭhatām vā

analyzed: ye sattvāḥ te sarvi bodhāya lābhinaḥ

analyzed: vineṣyanti iha prāṇa koṭyaḥ

analyzed: praṇidhānam etat hi tathāgatānām bodhāya carāpayeyam

original: (Vaidya 38)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: upāya kauśalya prakāśayanti vividhāni yānāni upadarśayanti

original: ekaṃ ca yānaṃ paridīpayanti buddhā imāmuttamaśāntabhūmim // Saddhp_2.105 //
analyzed: ekam ca yānam paridīpayanti buddhāḥ imām uttama śānta bhūmim

original: vīryaṃ ca sthāmaṃ ca viditva teṣāṃ jñātvādhimuktiṃ ca prakāśayanti // Saddhp_2.106 //

analyzed: nānā adhimuktān ca sattvān nānā abhinirhārā upadarśayanti

original: ahaṃ pi caitarhi jinendranāyako utpanna sattvāna sukhāpanārtham /
analyzed: aham ca etarhi jinendra nāyakaḥ sukhāpana artham

analyzed: saṃdarśayāmi buddha bodhim nānā abhinirhāra sahasra koṭibhiḥ

original: deśemi dharmaṃ ca bahuprakāraṃ adhimuktimadhyāśaya jñātva prāṇinām /
analyzed: deśemi dharmam ca bahu prakāram adhimuktim adhyāśaya jñātvā prāṇinām

original: saṃharṣayāmī vividhairupāyaiḥ pratyātmikaṃ jñānabalaṃ mamaitat // Saddhp_2.109 //
analyzed: saṃharṣayāmī vividhaiḥ upāyaiḥ pratyātmikam jñāna balam mama etat

original: ahaṃ pi paśyāmi daridrasattvān prajñāya puṇyehi ca viprahīṇān /
analyzed: aham pi paśyāmi daridra sattvān prajñāya puṇyehi ca viprahīṇān

original: (Vaidya 39)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: praskanna saṃsāri niruddha durge magnāḥ punar duḥkha paraṃparāsu

analyzed: tṛṣṇā vilagnān camarī iva bāle kāmaiḥ iha andhīkṛta sarvakālam

original: na buddhameṣanti mahānubhāvaṃ na dharma mārganti dukhāntagāminam // Saddhp_2.111 //
analyzed: na buddham eṣanti mahā anubhāvam na dharma mārganti dukhānta gāminam

analyzed: ṣaṭsu pariruddha cittāḥ kudṛṣṭi dṛṣṭīṣu sthitāḥ akampyāḥ

analyzed: duḥkha anupradhāvamānāḥ kāruṇya mahyam balavantu teṣu

analyzed: saḥ ham bodhimaṇḍe saṃsthitaḥ

original: arthaṃ vicintemimamevarūpaṃ ullokayan pādapameva tatra // Saddhp_2.113 //
analyzed: artham ullokayan pādapam eva tatra

analyzed: prekṣāmi tam ca animiṣam druma indram tasya eva heṣṭhe anucaṃkramāmi

analyzed: āścarya jñānam ca idam viśiṣṭam sattvāḥ ca mohāndha avidvasū ime

original: brahmā ca māṃ yācati tasmi kāle śakraśca catvāri ca lokapālāḥ /
analyzed: brahmā ca mām yācati tasmi kāle śakraḥ ca catvāri ca lokapālāḥ

original: maheśvaro īśvara eva cāpi marudgaṇānāṃ ca sahasrakoṭayaḥ // Saddhp_2.115 //
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ īśvaraḥ eva ca api marut gaṇānām ca sahasra koṭayaḥ

original: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sthitāḥ sagauravā arthaṃ ca cintemi kathaṃ karomi /
analyzed: sthitāḥ sa gauravāḥ artham ca cintemi katham karomi

original: ahaṃ ca bodhīya vadāmi varṇān ime ca duḥkhairabhibhūta sattvāḥ // Saddhp_2.116 //
analyzed: aham ca vadāmi varṇān ime ca duḥkhaiḥ abhibhūta sattvāḥ

original: te mahya dharmaṃ kṣipi bālabhāṣitaṃ kṣipitva gaccheyurapāyabhūmim /
analyzed: te dharmam kṣipi bāla bhāṣitam kṣipitva gaccheyuḥ apāya bhūmim

original: śreyo mamā naiva kadāci bhāṣituṃ adyaiva me nirvṛtirastu śāntā // Saddhp_2.117 //
analyzed: śreyaḥ na eva kadācid bhāṣitum adyā eva me nirvṛtiḥ astu śāntā

original: (Vaidya 40)
analyzed: vaidya

original: purimāṃśca buddhān samanusmaranto upāyakauśalyu yathā ca teṣām /
analyzed: purimān ca buddhān samanusmarantaḥ upāya kauśalyu yathā ca teṣām

original: yaṃ nūna haṃ pi ima buddhabodhiṃ tridhā vibhajyeha prakāśayeyam // Saddhp_2.118 //
analyzed: yam nūna ham buddha bodhim tridhā vibhajya iha prakāśayeyam

original: evaṃ ca me cintitu eṣa dharmo ye cānye buddhā daśasu ddiśāsu /
analyzed: evam ca me eṣa dharmaḥ ye ca anye buddhāḥ daśasu ddiśāsu

original: darśiṃsu te mahya tadātmabhāvaṃ sādhuṃ ti ghoṣaṃ samudīrayanti // Saddhp_2.119 //
analyzed: te tad ātmabhāvam sādhum ti ghoṣam samudīrayanti

original: sādhū mune lokavināyakāgra anuttaraṃ jñānamihādhigamya /
analyzed: sādhu mune anuttaram jñānam iha adhigamya

original: upāyakauśalyu vicintayanto anuśikṣase lokavināyakānām // Saddhp_2.120 //
analyzed: upāya kauśalyu anuśikṣase loka vināyakānām

original: vayaṃ pi buddhāya paraṃ tadā padaṃ tṛdhā ca kṛtvāna prakāśayāmaḥ /
analyzed: vayam buddhāya param tadā padam tṛdhā ca prakāśayāmaḥ

original: hīnādhimuktā hi avidvasū narā bhaviṣyathā buddha na śraddadheyuḥ // Saddhp_2.121 //
analyzed: hīna adhimuktāḥ hi avidvasū narāḥ bhaviṣyathāḥ buddha na śraddadheyuḥ

original: tato vayaṃ kāraṇasaṃgraheṇa upāyakauśalya niṣevamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: tatas vayam kāraṇa saṃgraheṇa upāya kauśalya niṣevamāṇāḥ

original: phalābhilāṣaṃ parikīrtayantaḥ samādapemo bahubodhisattvān // Saddhp_2.122 //
analyzed: phala abhilāṣam parikīrtayantaḥ samādapemaḥ bahu bodhisattvān

original: ahaṃ cudagrastada āsi śrutvā ghoṣaṃ manojñaṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇām /
analyzed: aham cudagraḥ tadā āsi śrutvā ghoṣam manojñam puruṣa ṛṣabhāṇām

original: udagracitto bhaṇi teṣa tāyināṃ na mohavādī pravarā maharṣī // Saddhp_2.123 //
analyzed: udagra cittaḥ tāyinām na moha vādī pravarāḥ mahā ṛṣī

original: ahaṃ pi evaṃ samudācariṣye yathā vadantī vidu lokanāyakāḥ /
analyzed: aham evam samudācariṣye yathā vadantī loka nāyakāḥ

original: ahaṃ pi saṃkṣobhi imasmi dāruṇe utpanna sattvāna kaṣāyamadhye // Saddhp_2.124 //
analyzed: aham dāruṇe utpanna kaṣāya madhye

original: tato hyahaṃ śārisutā viditvā vārāṇasīṃ prasthitu tasmi kāle /
analyzed: tatas hi aham śāri sutā viditvā vārāṇasīm tasmin kāle

original: (Vaidya 41)
analyzed: vaidya

original: tahi pañcakānāṃ pravadāmi bhikṣuṇāṃ dharmaṃ upāyena praśāntabhūmim // Saddhp_2.125 //
analyzed: pañcakānām pravadāmi bhikṣuṇām dharmam upāyena praśānta bhūmim

analyzed: tatas pravṛttam mama dharmacakram nirvāṇa śabdaḥ ca abhūṣi loke

original: arhantaśabdastatha dharmaśabdaḥ saṃghasya śabdaśca abhūṣi tatra // Saddhp_2.126 //
analyzed: dharma śabdaḥ saṃghasya śabdaḥ ca tatra

original: bhāṣāmi varṣāṇi analpakāni nirvāṇabhūmiṃ cupadarśayāmi /
analyzed: bhāṣāmi varṣāṇi analpakāni nirvāṇa bhūmim

original: saṃsāraduḥkhasya ca eṣa anto evaṃ vadāmī ahu nityakālam // Saddhp_2.127 //
analyzed: saṃsāra duḥkhasya ca eṣa antaḥ evam vadāmi nityakālam

original: yasmiṃśca kāle ahu śāriputra paśyāmi putrān dvipadottamānām /
analyzed: yasmin ca kāle ahu śāriputra paśyāmi putrān dvipada uttamānām

analyzed: ye prasthitāḥ uttamam agra bodhim koṭī sahasrāṇi analpakāni

analyzed: upasaṃkramitvā ca mama eva antike kṛtāñjalīḥ sarvi sthitāḥ sa gauravāḥ

original: yehī śruto dharma jināna āsīt upāyakauśalyu bahuprakāram // Saddhp_2.129 //
analyzed: śrutaḥ dharma jinānaḥ āsīt bahu prakāram

original: tato mamā etadabhūṣi tatkṣaṇaṃ samayo mamā bhāṣitumagradharmam /
analyzed: tatas mama tad kṣaṇam samayaḥ mama bhāṣitum agra dharmam

original: yasyāhamarthaṃ iha loki jātaḥ prakāśayāmī tamihāgrabodhim // Saddhp_2.130 //
analyzed: yasya aham artham iha loki jātaḥ prakāśayāmi tam iha agra bodhim

original: duḥśraddadhaṃ etu bhaviṣyate 'dya nimittasaṃjñāniha bālabuddhinām /
analyzed: duḥśraddadham etu bhaviṣyate nimitta saṃjñān iha bāla buddhinām

original: adhimānaprāptāna avidvasūnāṃ ime tu śroṣyanti hi bodhisattvāḥ // Saddhp_2.131 //
analyzed: avidvasūnām ime tu śroṣyanti hi bodhisattvāḥ

original: viśāradaścāhu tadā prahṛṣṭaḥ saṃlīyanāṃ sarva vivarjayitvā /
analyzed: viśāradaḥ ca āhuḥ tadā prahṛṣṭaḥ saṃlīyanām vivarjayitvā

analyzed: bhāṣāmi madhye sugata ātmajānām tān ca eva bodhāya samādapemi

original: (Vaidya 42)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: saṃdṛśya ca etādṛśa buddha putrān tava api kāṅkṣā vyapanīta

analyzed: mama api eṣā eva vikalpa varjitā tathā eva ham adya tubhyam

analyzed: kadāci kahiṃci kathaṃci loke puruṣa ṛṣabhāṇām

analyzed: utpadya ca loki ananta cakṣuṣaḥ kadācid etādṛśu dharma

analyzed: su durlabhaḥ agra dharmaḥ syāt

analyzed: su durlabhāḥ īdṛśakāḥ ca sattvāḥ ye śraddadhi agra dharmam

analyzed: audumbaram puṣpa yathā eva durlabham kadācid kahiṃci kathaṃci dṛśyate

original: manojñarūpaṃ ca janasya tadbhavedāścaryu lokasya sadevakasya // Saddhp_2.137 //
analyzed: manojña rūpam ca janasya tat bhavet āścaryu lokasya sa devakasya

analyzed: atas ca āścaryataram vadāmi yaḥ dharmam imam subhāṣitam

analyzed: ekam pi bhaṇeya vācam bhaveya pūjā

analyzed: vyapanehi kāṅkṣām iha saṃśayam ca ārocayāmi ahu dharmarājā

analyzed: samādapemi aham agra bodhau na śrāvakāḥ kecid iha asti mahyam

original: tava śāriputraitu rahasyu bhotu ye cāpi me śrāvaka mahya sarve /
analyzed: tava śāriputra etu ye ca api me sarve

original: (Vaidya 43)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: ye bodhisattvāḥ ca ime pradhānāḥ rahasyam etat mama dhārayantu

analyzed: śrutvā ca yānam mama etat ekam prakāśitam tena jinena āsīt

analyzed: anāgate bhrameyuḥ sattvāḥ sūtram kṣipitvā narakam vrajeyuḥ

analyzed: ye ca bhaveyuḥ sattvāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ uttamam agra bodhim

analyzed: viśāradaḥ bhūtvā vademi teṣām ekasya yānasya ananta varṇān

analyzed: etādṛśī deśana nāyakānām upāya kauśalyam idam variṣṭham

analyzed: bahūhi saṃdhā vacanehi ca uktam durbodhyam etam hi a śikṣitehi

analyzed: tasmāt hi saṃdhā vacanam vijāniyāḥ buddhāna loka ācariyāṇa tāyinām

analyzed: jahitva kāṅkṣām vijahitva saṃśayam bhaviṣyathāḥ buddha janetha harṣam

analyzed: iti ārya saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye upāyakauśalyaparivartaḥ nāma dvitīyaḥ

original: (Vaidya 44)
analyzed: vaidya

original: Saddhp_3: aupamyaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: aupamya parivartaḥ

original: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ tasyām velāyām tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ ātta manāḥ pramuditaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ

original: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavato 'bhimukho bhagavantameva vyavalokayamāno
analyzed: yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavataḥ bhimukhaḥ bhagavantam eva vyavalokayamānaḥ

original: bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryādbhutaprāpto 'smi bhagavan audbilyaprāptaḥ idamevaṃrūpaṃ
analyzed: bhagavantam etat avocat āścarya adbhuta prāptaḥ smi bhagavan audbilya prāptaḥ idam evaṃrūpam

original: bhagavato 'ntikād ghoṣaṃ śrutvā /
analyzed: bhagavataḥ ntikāt ghoṣam śrutvā

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: aśrutvaiva tāvadahaṃ bhagavan idamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavato 'ntikād dharmaṃ tadanyān bodhisattvān dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvānāṃ ca anāgate 'dhvani buddhanāma  #
analyzed: a śrutvā eva tāvat aham bhagavan idam evaṃrūpam bhagavataḥ ntikāt dharmam tad anyān bodhisattvān dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvānām ca anāgate dhvani buddha nāma

original: śrutvā atīva śocāmi atīva saṃtapye,
analyzed: śrutvā atīva śocāmi atīva saṃtapye

original: bhraṣṭo 'smyevaṃrūpāt tathāgatajñānagocarād jñānadarśanāt /
analyzed: bhraṣṭaḥ smi evaṃrūpāt tathāgata jñāna gocarāt jñāna darśanāt

original: yadā cāhaṃ bhagavan abhīkṣṇaṃ gacchāmi parvatagirikandarāṇi vanaṣaṇḍānyārāmanadīvṛkṣamūlānyekāntāni divāvihārāya,
analyzed: yadā ca aham bhagavan abhīkṣṇam gacchāmi parvata giri kandarāṇi vana ṣaṇḍāni ārāma nadī vṛkṣa mūlāni ekāntāni divāvihārāya

original: tadāpyahaṃ bhagavan yadbhūyastvena anenaiva vihāreṇa viharāmi /
analyzed: tadā api aham bhagavan yat bhūyastvena anena eva vihāreṇa viharāmi

original: tulye nāma dharmadhātupraveśe vayaṃ bhagavatā hīnena yānena niryātitāḥ /
analyzed: tulye nāma dharmadhātu praveśe vayam bhagavatā hīnena yānena niryātitāḥ
