analyzed: evam ca me bhagavan tasmin samaye bhavati asmākam eva eṣaḥ parādhaḥ

original: naiva bhagavato 'parādhaḥ /
analyzed: na eva bhagavataḥ parādhaḥ

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sacedbhagavānasmābhiḥ pratīkṣitaḥ syāt sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kathayamānaḥ,
analyzed: saced bhagavān asmābhiḥ pratīkṣitaḥ syāt sāmutkarṣikīm dharma deśanām kathayamānaḥ

original: yadidamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya,
analyzed: yat idam anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim ārabhya

original: teṣveva vayaṃ bhagavan dharmeṣu niryātāḥ syāma /
analyzed: teṣu eva vayam bhagavan dharmeṣu niryātāḥ syāma

original: yatpunarbhagavan asmābhiranupasthiteṣu bodhisattveṣu saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ bhagavato 'jānamānaistvaramāṇaiḥ
analyzed: yat punar bhagavan asmābhiḥ anupasthiteṣu bodhisattveṣu saṃdhā bhāṣyam bhagavataḥ jānamānaiḥ tvaramāṇaiḥ

original: prathamabhāṣitaiva tathāgatasya dharmadeśanā śrutvodgṛhītā dhāritā bhāvitā cintitā manasikṛtā /
analyzed: prathama bhāṣitā eva tathāgatasya dharma deśanā śrutvā udgṛhītā dhāritā bhāvitā cintitā manasi kṛtā

original: so 'haṃ bhagavan ātmaparibhāṣaṇayaiva bhūyiṣṭhena rātriṃdivānyatināmayāmi /
analyzed: saḥ ham bhagavan ātma paribhāṣaṇayā eva bhūyiṣṭhena rātriṃdivāni atināmayāmi

original: adyāsmi bhagavan nirvāṇaprāptaḥ /
analyzed: adyā asmi bhagavat nirvāṇa prāptaḥ

original: adyāsmi bhagavan parinirvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: adya asmi bhagavan parinirvṛtaḥ

original: adya me bhagavan arhattvaṃ prāptam /
analyzed: adya me bhagavan arhat tvam prāptam

original: adyāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ putro jyeṣṭha auraso mukhato jāto dharmajo dharmanirmito dharmadāyādo dharmanirvṛttaḥ /
analyzed: adya aham bhagavan bhagavataḥ putraḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ aurasaḥ mukhataḥ jātaḥ dharma jaḥ dharma nirmitaḥ dharma dāyādaḥ dharma nirvṛttaḥ

original: apagataparidāho 'smyadya bhagavan imamevaṃrūpamadbhutadharmamaśrutapūrvaṃ bhagavato 'ntikād ghoṣaṃ śrutvā //
analyzed: apagata paridāhaḥ smi adya bhagavan imam evaṃrūpam adbhuta dharmam a śruta pūrvam bhagavataḥ ntikāt ghoṣam śrutvā

original: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ tasyām velāyām bhagavantam ābhiḥ gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣata

original: āścaryaprāpto 'smi mahāvināyaka audbilyajāto imu ghoṣa śrutvā /
analyzed: āścarya prāptaḥ smi mahā vināyaka audbilya jātaḥ ghoṣa śrutvā

original: kathaṃkathā mahya na bhūya kācit paripācito 'haṃ iha agrayāne // Saddhp_3.1 //
analyzed: kathaṃkathā na kācid paripācitaḥ haṃ iha agrayāne

original: āścaryabhūtaḥ sugatāna ghoṣaḥ kāṅkṣāṃ ca śokaṃ ca jahāti prāṇinām /
analyzed: āścarya bhūtaḥ ghoṣaḥ kāṅkṣām ca śokam ca jahāti prāṇinām

original: kṣīṇāsravasyo mama yaśca śoko vigato 'sti sarvaṃ śruṇiyāna ghoṣam // Saddhp_3.2 //
analyzed: kṣīṇa āsra vasyaḥ mama yaḥ ca śokaḥ vigataḥ sti sarvam

original: divāvihāramanucaṃkramanto vanaṣaṇḍa ārāmatha vṛkṣamūlam /
analyzed: divāvihāram anucaṃkramantaḥ vana ṣaṇḍe ārām atha vṛkṣa mūlam

original: (Vaidya 45)
analyzed: vaidya

original: girikandarāṃścāupyupasevamāno anucintayāmī imameva cintām // Saddhp_3.3 //
analyzed: giri kandarān ca aupī upasevamānaḥ anucintayāmī imam eva cintām

original: aho 'smi parivañcitu pāpacittaistulyeṣu dharmeṣu anāsraveṣu /
analyzed: aho smi pāpa cittaiḥ tulyeṣu dharmeṣu anāsraveṣu

original: yannāma traidhātuki agradharmaṃ na deśayiṣyāmi anāgate 'dhve // Saddhp_3.4 //
analyzed: yat nāma traidhātuki agra dharmam na deśayiṣyāmi anāgate dhve

original: dvātriṃśatī lakṣaṇa mahya bhraṣṭā suvarṇavarṇacchavitā ca bhraṣṭā /
analyzed: dvātriṃśatī bhraṣṭā suvarṇa varṇa chavi tā ca bhraṣṭā

original: balā vimokṣāścimi sarvi riñcitā tulyeṣu dharmeṣu aho 'smi mūḍhaḥ // Saddhp_3.5 //
analyzed: balā vimokṣa aścimi sarvi riñcitā tulyeṣu dharmeṣu aho smi mūḍhaḥ

original: anuvyañjanā ye ca mahāmunīnāmaśīti pūrṇāḥ pravarā viśiṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: anuvyañjanāḥ ye ca mahāmunīnām aśīti pūrṇāḥ pravarāḥ viśiṣṭāḥ

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇika ye ca dharmāste cāpi bhraṣṭā ahu vañcito 'smi // Saddhp_3.6 //
analyzed: ye ca dharmāḥ te ca api bhraṣṭāḥ smi

original: dṛṣṭvā ca tvāṃ lokahitānukampī divāvihāraṃ parigamya caikaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca tvām loka hita anukampī divāvihāram parigamya ca ekaḥ

original: hā vañcito 'smīti vicintayāmi asaṅgajñānātu acintiyātaḥ // Saddhp_3.7 //
analyzed: hā vañcitaḥ smi iti vicintayāmi

original: rātriṃdivāni kṣapayāmi nātha bhūyiṣṭha so eva vicintayantaḥ /
analyzed: rātriṃdivāni kṣapayāmi nātha bhūyiṣṭha eva vicintayantaḥ

original: pṛcchāmi tāvad bhagavantameva bhraṣṭo 'hamasmītyatha vā na veti // Saddhp_3.8 //
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tāvat bhagavantam eva bhraṣṭaḥ ham asmi iti atha vā na vā iti

original: evaṃ ca me cintayato jinendra gacchanti rātriṃdiva nityakālam /
analyzed: evam ca me cintayataḥ jinendra gacchanti rātriṃdiva nityakālam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca anyān bahubodhisattvān saṃvarṇitāṃllokavināyakena // Saddhp_3.9 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca anyān bahu bodhisattvān saṃvarṇitān loka vināyakena

original: śrutvā ca so 'haṃ imu buddhadharmaṃ saṃghāya etatkila bhāṣitaṃ ti /
analyzed: śrutvā ca saḥ haṃ buddha dharmam saṃghāya etat kila bhāṣitam

original: atarkikaṃ sūkṣmamanāsravaṃ ca jñānaṃ praṇetī jina bodhimaṇḍe // Saddhp_3.10 //
analyzed: atarkikam sūkṣmam anāsravam ca jñānam jina bodhimaṇḍe

original: (Vaidya 46)
analyzed: vaidya

original: dṛṣṭīvilagno hyahamāsi pūrvaṃ parivrājakastīrthikasaṃmataśca /
analyzed: dṛṣṭīvilagnaḥ hi aham āsi pūrvam parivrājakaḥ tīrthika saṃmataḥ ca

original: tato mamā āśayu jñātva nātho dṛṣṭīvimokṣāya bravīti nirvṛtim // Saddhp_3.11 //
analyzed: nāthaḥ nirvṛtim

original: vimucya tā dṛṣṭikṛtāni sarvaśaḥ śūnyāṃśca dharmānahu sparśayitvā /
analyzed: vimucya tāḥ dṛṣṭi kṛtāni sarvaśas śūnyān ca dharmān ahu sparśayitvā

original: tato vijānāmyahu nirvṛto 'smi na cāpi nirvāṇamidaṃ pravucyati // Saddhp_3.12 //
analyzed: tatas vijānāmi ahu nirvṛtaḥ smi na ca api nirvāṇam idam pravucyati

original: yadā tu buddho bhavate 'grasattvaḥ puraskṛto naramaruyakṣarākṣasaiḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu buddhaḥ bhavate gra sattvaḥ puraskṛtaḥ nara maru yakṣa rākṣasaiḥ

original: dvātriṃśatīlakṣaṇarūpadhārī aśeṣato nirvṛtu bhoti tatra // Saddhp_3.13 //
analyzed: dvātriṃśatī lakṣaṇa rūpa dhārī aśeṣatas tatra

original: vyapanīta sarvāṇi mi manyitāni śrutvā ca ghoṣaṃ ahamadya nirvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vyapanīta sarvāṇi mi manyitāni śrutvā ca ghoṣam aham adya nirvṛtaḥ

original: yadāpi vyākurvasi agrabodhau purato hi lokasya sadevakasya // Saddhp_3.14 //
analyzed: yadā api vyākurvasi agra bodhau puratas hi lokasya sa devakasya

original: balavacca āsīnmama chambhitatvaṃ prathamaṃ giraṃ śrutva vināyakasya /
analyzed: balavat ca āsīt mama chambhita tvam prathamam giram śrutva vināyakasya

original: mā haiva māro sa bhavedviheṭhako abhinirmiṇitvā bhuvi buddhaveṣam // Saddhp_3.15 //
analyzed: mā ha eva māraḥ sa bhavet viheṭhakaḥ abhinirmiṇitvā bhuvi buddha veṣam

original: yadā tu hetūhi ca kāraṇaiśca dṛṣṭāntakoṭīnayutaiśca darśitā /
analyzed: yadā tu ca kāraṇaiḥ ca dṛṣṭānta koṭī nayutaiḥ ca darśitā

original: suparisthitā sā varabuddhabodhistato 'smi niṣkāṅkṣu śruṇitva dharmam // Saddhp_3.16 //
analyzed: su paristhitā sā vara buddha bodhiḥ tatas smi dharmam

original: yadā ca me buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ kīrteṣyatī tān parinirvṛtān jinān /
analyzed: yadā ca me buddha sahasra koṭyaḥ kīrtā iṣyatī tān parinirvṛtān jinān

original: yathā ca tairdeśitu eṣa dharma upāyakauśalya pratiṣṭhihitvā // Saddhp_3.17 //
analyzed: yathā ca eṣa dharmaḥ upāya kauśalya

original: anāgatāśco bahu buddha loke tiṣṭhanti ye co paramārthadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: bahu buddha loke tiṣṭhanti ye ca parama artha darśinaḥ

original: (Vaidya 47)
analyzed: vaidya

original: upāyakauśalyaśataiśca dharmaṃ nidarśayiṣyantyatha deśayanti ca // Saddhp_3.18 //
analyzed: upāya kauśalya śataiḥ ca dharmam nidarśayiṣyanti atha deśayanti ca

original: tathā ca te ātmana yādṛśī carī abhiniṣkramitvā prabhṛtīya saṃstutā /
analyzed: tathā ca te ātmana yādṛśī carī abhiniṣkramitvā saṃstutā

original: buddhaṃ ca te yādṛśu dharmacakraṃ tathā ca te 'vasthita dharmadeśanā // Saddhp_3.19 //
analyzed: buddham ca te dharma cakram tathā ca te dharma deśanā

original: tataśca jānāmi na eṣa māro bhūtāṃ cariṃ darśayi lokanāthaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca jānāmi naḥ eṣa māraḥ bhūtām carim loka nāthaḥ

original: na hyatra mārāṇa gatī hi vidyate mamaiva cittaṃ vicikitsaprāptam // Saddhp_3.20 //
analyzed: na hi atra mārāṇa gatī hi vidyate mama eva cittam vicikitsa prāptam

original: yadā tu madhureṇa gabhīravalgunā saṃharṣito buddhasvareṇa cāham /
analyzed: yadā tu madhureṇa gabhīra valgunā saṃharṣitaḥ buddha svareṇa ca aham

original: tadā mi vidhvaṃsita sarvasaṃśayā vicikitsa naṣṭā ca sthito 'smi jñāne // Saddhp_3.21 //
analyzed: tadā mi sarva saṃśayā naṣṭā ca sthitaḥ smi jñāne

original: niḥsaṃśayaṃ bheṣyi tathāgato 'haṃ puraskṛto loki sadevake 'smin /
analyzed: niḥsaṃśayam tathāgataḥ ham puraskṛtaḥ loki sa devake smin

original: saṃghāya vakṣye imu buddhabodhiṃ samādapento bahubodhisattvān // Saddhp_3.22 //
analyzed: saṃghāya vakṣye buddha bodhim samādapentaḥ bahu bodhisattvān

original: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - ārocayāmi te śāriputra,
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāriputram etat avocat ārocayāmi te śāriputra

original: prativedayāmi te asya sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ purataḥ /
analyzed: prativedayāmi te asya sa devakasya lokasya puratas sa mārakasya sa brahmakasya sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ puratas

original: mayā tvaṃ śāriputra viṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmantike paripācito 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: mayā tvam śāriputra viṃśatīnām buddha koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇām antike paripācitaḥ nuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: mama ca tvaṃ śāriputra dīrgharātramanuśikṣito 'bhūt /
analyzed: mama ca tvam śāriputra dīrgharātram anuśikṣitaḥ bhūt

original: sa tvaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasaṃmantritena bodhisattvarahasyena iha mama pravacane upapannaḥ /
analyzed: sa tvam śāriputra bodhisattva saṃmantritena bodhisattva rahasyena iha mama pravacane upapannaḥ

original: sa tvaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānena tatpaurvakaṃ caryāpraṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasaṃmantritaṃ bodhisattvarahasyaṃ na samanusmarasi /
analyzed: sa tvam śāriputra bodhisattva adhiṣṭhānena tad paurvakam caryā praṇidhānam bodhisattva saṃmantritam bodhisattva rahasyam na samanusmarasi

original: nirvṛto 'smīti manyase /
analyzed: nirvṛtaḥ smi iti manyase

original: so 'haṃ tvāṃ śāriputra pūrvacaryāpraṇidhānajñānānubodhamanusmārayitukāma imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ham tvām śāriputra pūrva caryā praṇidhāna jñāna anubodham anusmārayitu kāmaḥ imam saddharmapuṇḍarīkam

original: dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ saṃprakāśayāmi //
analyzed: dharmaparyāyam sūtrāntam mahā vaipulyam bodhisattva avavādam sarva buddha parigraham śrāvakāṇām saṃprakāśayāmi

original: api khalu punaḥ śāriputra,
analyzed: api khalu punar śāriputra

original: bhaviṣyasi tvamanāgate 'dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpairacintyairapramāṇairbahūnāṃ tathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
analyzed: bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpaiḥ acintyaiḥ apramāṇaiḥ bahūnām tathāgata koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇām

original: saddharmaṃ dhārayitvā vividhāṃ ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā imāmeva bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya
analyzed: saddharmam dhārayitvā vividhām ca pūjām kṛtvā imām eva bodhisattva caryām paripūrya

original: padmaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi (Vaidya 48)
analyzed: padmaprabhaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke bhaviṣyasi vaidya

original: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān //
analyzed: vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra samayena tasya bhagavataḥ padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya
analyzed: tena khalu punar śāriputra samayena tasya bhagavataḥ padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya

original: virajaṃ nāma buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ paramasudarśanīyaṃ
analyzed: virajam nāma buddhakṣetram bhaviṣyati samam ramaṇīyam prāsādikam parama su darśanīyam

original: pariśuddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca bahujananārīgaṇākīrṇaṃ
analyzed: pariśuddham ca sphītam ca ṛddham ca kṣemam ca subhikṣam ca bahu jana nārī gaṇa ākīrṇam

original: ca maruprakīrṇaṃ ca vaiḍūryamayaṃ suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddham /
analyzed: ca maru prakīrṇam ca vaiḍūrya mayam suvarṇa sūtra aṣṭāpada nibaddham

original: teṣu ca aṣṭāpadeṣu ratnavṛkṣā bhaviṣyanti saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ puṣpaphalaiḥ satatasamitaṃ samarpitāḥ //
analyzed: teṣu ca aṣṭāpadeṣu ratna vṛkṣāḥ bhaviṣyanti saptānām ratnānām puṣpa phalaiḥ satata samitam samarpitāḥ

original: so 'pi śāriputra padmaprabhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastrīṇyeva yānānyārabhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati /
analyzed: saḥ pi śāriputra padmaprabhaḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ trīṇi eva yānāni ārabhya dharmam deśayiṣyati

original: kiṃcāpi śāriputra sa tathāgato na kalpakaṣāya utpatsyate,
analyzed: kiṃca api śāriputra sa tathāgataḥ na kalpa kaṣāye utpatsyate

original: api tu praṇidhānavaśena dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati /
analyzed: api tu praṇidhāna vaśena dharmam deśayiṣyati

original: mahāratnapratimaṇḍitaśca nāma śāriputra sa kalpo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: mahāratnapratimaṇḍitaḥ ca nāma śāriputra sa kalpaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa kalpo mahāratnapratimaṇḍita ityucyate?
analyzed: tat kim manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa kalpaḥ mahāratnapratimaṇḍitaḥ iti ucyate

original: ratnāni śāriputra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā ucyante /
analyzed: ratnāni śāriputra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvāḥ ucyante

original: te tasmin kāle tasyāṃ virajāyāṃ lokadhātau bahavo bodhisattvā bhaviṣyantyaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā acintyā atulyā amāpyā gaṇanāṃ samatikrāntā anyatra  #
analyzed: te tasmin kāle tasyām virajāyām lokadhātau bahavaḥ bodhisattvāḥ bhaviṣyanti aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ acintyāḥ atulyāḥ a māpyāḥ gaṇanām samatikrāntāḥ anyatra

original: tathāgatagaṇanayā /
analyzed: tathāgata gaṇanayā

original: tena kāraṇena sa kalpo mahāratnapratimaṇḍita ityucyate //
analyzed: tena kāraṇena sa kalpaḥ mahāratnapratimaṇḍitaḥ iti ucyate

original: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra samayena bodhisattvāstasmin buddhakṣetre yadbhūyasā ratnapadmavikrāmiṇo bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: tena khalu punar śāriputra samayena bodhisattvāḥ tasmin buddhakṣetre yat bhūyasā ratna padma vikrāmiṇaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: anādikarmikāśca te bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: anādi karmikāḥ ca te bodhisattvāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ciracaritakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaśatasahasracīrṇabrahmacaryāḥ,
analyzed: cira carita kuśala mūlāḥ bahu buddha śata sahasra cīrṇa brahmacaryāḥ

original: tathāgataparisaṃstutā buddhajñānābhiyuktā mahābhijñāparikarmanirjātāḥ sarvadharmanayakuśalā mārdavāḥ smṛtimantaḥ /
analyzed: tathāgata parisaṃstutāḥ buddha jñāna abhiyuktāḥ mahā abhijñā parikarma nirjātāḥ sarva dharma naya kuśalāḥ mārdavāḥ smṛtimantaḥ

original: bhūyiṣṭhena śāriputra evaṃrūpāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paripūrṇaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: bhūyiṣṭhena śāriputra evaṃrūpāṇām bodhisattvānām paripūrṇam tat buddhakṣetram bhaviṣyati

original: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya dvādaśāntarakalpā āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati sthāpayitvā kumārabhūtatvam /
analyzed: tasya khalu punar śāriputra padmaprabhasya tathāgatasya dvādaśa antara kalpāḥ āyuṣpramāṇam bhaviṣyati sthāpayitvā kumāra bhūta tvam

original: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāmaṣṭāntarakalpā āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: teṣām ca sattvānām aṣṭa antara kalpāḥ āyuṣpramāṇam bhaviṣyati

original: sa ca śāriputra padmaprabhastathāgato dvādaśānāmantarakalpānāmatyayena dhṛtiparipūrṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ vyākṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau  #
analyzed: sa ca śāriputra padmaprabhaḥ tathāgataḥ dvādaśānām antara kalpānām atyayena dhṛtiparipūrṇam nāma bodhisattvam mahāsattvam vyākṛtya anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: parinirvāsyati /
analyzed: parinirvāsyati

original: ayaṃ bhikṣavo dhṛtiparipūrṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
analyzed: ayam bhikṣavaḥ dhṛtiparipūrṇaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mama anantaram anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate

analyzed: dharmacakram pravartesi loke apratipudgala

original: (Vaidya 51)

analyzed: mahat ca asya niveśanam bhavet ucchritam ca vistīrṇam ca cira kṛtam ca jīrṇam ca dvayoḥ vā trayāṇām vā caturṇām vā pañcānām vā prāṇi śatānām āvāsaḥ

original: (Vaidya 52)

analyzed: hasta mātrāḥ dvi hasta mātrāḥ canucaṃkramanti

analyzed: te ca api śvānān parigṛhya pādaiḥ uttānakān kṛtvā tathā eva bhūmau

analyzed: grīvāsu ca utpīḍya vibhartsayantaḥ vyābādhayantaḥ ca ramanti tatra

analyzed: nānāḥ ca kṛṣṇāḥ ca tathā eva durbalāḥ uccāḥ mahantāḥ ca vasanti pretāḥ

analyzed: jighatsitāḥ bhojana mārgamāṇāḥ ārta svaram krandiṣu tatra tatra

original: sūcīmukhā goṇamukhāśca kecit manuṣyamātrāstatha śvānamātrāḥ /
analyzed: sūcīmukhāḥ goṇamukhāḥ ca kecid manuṣya mātrāḥ śvāna mātrāḥ

original: (Vaidya 58)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: prakīrṇa keśāḥ ca karonti śabdam āhāra tṛṣṇā paridahyamānāḥ

analyzed: caturdiśam ca atra vilokayanti nityam

analyzed: te yakṣa pretāḥ ca piśācakāḥ ca gṛdhrāḥ ca āhāra gaveṣamāṇāḥ

analyzed: etādṛśam tat gṛham bhavet mahantam uccam ca su durbalam ca

analyzed: vijarjaram durbalam itvaram ca puruṣasya ekasya parigraham bhavet

analyzed: sa ca bāhyatas syāt puruṣaḥ gṛhasya niveśanam tat ca bhavet pradīptam

analyzed: sahasā samantena caturdiśam ca jvālā sahasraiḥ paridīpyamānam

analyzed: vaṃśāḥ ca dārūṇi ca agni tāpitāḥ karonti śabdam gurukam su bhairavam

analyzed: pradīpta stambhāḥ ca tathā eva bhittayaḥ yakṣāḥ ca pretāḥ ca mucanti nādam

analyzed: jvālu uṣitāḥ gṛdhra śatāḥ ca bhūyas kumbhāṇḍakāḥ ploṣṭa mukhāḥ bhramanti

analyzed: samantataḥ vyāla śatāḥ ca tatra nadanti krośanti ca dahyamānāḥ

analyzed: piśācakāḥ tatra bahū bhramanti saṃtāpitāḥ manda puṇyāḥ

analyzed: dantehi anyam anyam rudhireṇa siñcanti ca dahyamānāḥ

analyzed: bherūṇḍakāḥ kālagatāḥ ca tatra khādanti sattvāḥ ca anyam anyam

original: (Vaidya 59)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: pradīpta keśāḥ ca bhramanti pretāḥ kṣudhāya dāhena ca dahyamānāḥ

analyzed: etādṛśam bhairava tat niveśanam jvālā sahasraiḥ hi viniścaradbhiḥ

original: puruṣaśca so tasya gṛhasya svāmī dvārasmi asthāsi vipaśyamānaḥ // Saddhp_3.62 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ ca saḥ tasya gṛhasya svāmī vipaśyamānaḥ

analyzed: śṛṇoti ca asau svake atra putrān krīḍāpanaiḥ krīḍana sakta buddhīn

analyzed: ramanti te krīḍanaka pramattāḥ yathā api bālāḥ a vijānamānāḥ

analyzed: śrutvā ca saḥ tatra kṣipram pramocana arthāya tad ātmajānām

analyzed: mā sarva dārakāḥ dahyeyu naśyeyu ca kṣipram eva

analyzed: vividhāḥ ca sattva iha ayam ca agni mahantikā duḥkha paraṃparā tu

analyzed: bheruṇḍakāḥ śvāna śṛgāla saṃghāḥ gṛdhrāḥ ca āhāra gaveṣamāṇāḥ

analyzed: etādṛśāḥ asmin bahavaḥ vasanti vinā api ca agneḥ paramam su bhairavam

analyzed: duḥkham idam kevalam eva rūpam samantataḥ ca agniḥ ayam pradīptaḥ

original: (Vaidya 60)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: na cintayante pitaram bhaṇantam na ca api teṣām manasīkaronti

analyzed: kim putra ihi aputrakasya mā nāma dahyeyuḥ iha agninā ime

analyzed: tasmin kāle lubdhāḥ ime krīḍanakeṣu bālāḥ

analyzed: na ca atra krīḍā ca ratī ca kācid

analyzed: mṛgaiḥ ajaiḥ goṇa varaiḥ ca yuktā uccā mahantā samalaṃkṛtā ca

analyzed: tāḥ bāhyatas asya niveśanasya nirdhāvatha te hi karotha kāryam

analyzed: yuṣmākam arthe maya kāritāni niryātha taiḥ tuṣṭa manāḥ sametya

analyzed: te yāne etādṛśakāḥ niśāmya ārabdha vīryāḥ tvaritāḥ hi bhūtvā

analyzed: nirdhāvitāḥ tad kṣaṇam eva sarve ākāśi tiṣṭhanti dukhena muktāḥ

analyzed: puruṣaḥ ca saḥ dṛṣṭva dārakān grāmasya madhye catvarasmin

analyzed: upaviśya siṃha āsani tān uvāca aho aham nirvṛtu adya mārṣāḥ

analyzed: ye duḥkha labdhāḥ mama te tapasvinaḥ bālāḥ

analyzed: te dārūṇe durga gṛhe abhūvan bahūjantūpūrṇe ca subhairave ca

original: (Vaidya 61)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: ādīptake jvāla sahasra pūrṇe ratā ca te krīḍa ratīṣu āsan

original: mayā ca te mocita adya sarve yenāhu nirvāṇu samāgato 'dya // Saddhp_3.76 //
analyzed: mayā ca te mocita adya sarve

analyzed: sukha sthitam tam pitaram viditvā upagamya te dārakaḥ evam āhuḥ

analyzed: dadāhi naḥ tāta yathā abhibhāṣitam trividhāni yānāni manoramāṇi

analyzed: saced tava satyaka tāta sarvam yat bhāṣitam tatra niveśane te

analyzed: trividhāni yānāni ha saṃpradāsye dadasva kālaḥ yam iha adya teṣām

analyzed: puruṣaḥ ca saḥ kośa balī bhaveta suvarṇa rūpyā maṇi muktakasya

analyzed: hiraṇya dāsāḥ ca analpakāḥ syuḥ upasthape ekavidhā sa yānā

analyzed: chatra dhvajebhiḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥ ca muktāmaṇī jālika chāditāḥ ca

analyzed: bastraiḥ udāraiḥ parisaṃvṛtāḥ ca pratyāstṛtāḥ dūṣya varaiḥ ca śuklaiḥ

analyzed: pratyāstṛtāḥ koṭi sahasra mūlyaiḥ varaiḥ ca kockaiḥ baka haṃsa lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: (Vaidya 62)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śvetāḥ supuṣṭā balavanta goṇā mahāpramāṇā abhidarśanīyāḥ /
analyzed: śvetāḥ su puṣṭāḥ balavanta goṇāḥ mahā pramāṇāḥ abhidarśanīyāḥ

analyzed: ye yojitāḥ ratna ratheṣu teṣu parigṛhītāḥ puruṣaiḥ anekaiḥ

analyzed: te ca api tuṣṭa ātta manāḥ ca te hi diśāḥ ca vidiśāḥ ca vrajanti krīḍakāḥ

analyzed: ham śārisutāḥ mahā ṛṣī trāṇam ca pitā ca

analyzed: putrāḥ ca te mahyam traidhātuke bālāḥ

analyzed: traidhātukam tat niveśanam su bhairavam duḥkha śata abhikīrṇam

analyzed: aśeṣatas prajvalitam samantāt jātī jarā vyādhi śataiḥ anekaiḥ

analyzed: upāya kauśalyam aham yānāni trīṇi pravadāmi ca eṣām

analyzed: jñātvā ca traidhātuki na eka doṣān nirdhāvana arthāya vadāmi upāyam

analyzed: mām ca eva ye niśrita bhonti putrāḥ ṣaḍabhijña traividya mahā anubhāvāḥ

original: (Vaidya 63)
analyzed: vaidya

original: pratyekabuddhāśca bhavanti ye 'tra avivartikā ye ciha bodhisattvāḥ // Saddhp_3.90 //
analyzed: pratyekabuddhāḥ ca bhavanti ye avivartikāḥ ye ca iha bodhisattvāḥ

original: samāna putrāṇa hu teṣa tatkṣaṇamimena dṛṣṭāntavareṇa paṇḍita /
analyzed: teṣa tad kṣaṇam imena dṛṣṭānta vareṇa paṇḍita

original: buddhāna jñānaṃ dvipadottamānāmudārarūpaṃ tatha vandanīyam // Saddhp_3.92 //
analyzed: jñānam dvipada uttamānām udāra rūpam vandanīyam

original: balāni dhyānāni tathā vimokṣāḥ samādhināṃ koṭiśatā ca nekā /
analyzed: balāni dhyānāni tathā vimokṣāḥ samādhinām koṭi śatā ca nekā

analyzed: ayam rathaḥ īdṛśakaḥ variṣṭhaḥ ramanti yena u sada buddha putrāḥ

analyzed: saṃvatsara anantara kalpam eva ca sahasra koṭyaḥ

original: ratnāmayaṃ yānamidaṃ variṣṭhaṃ gacchanti yeno iha bodhimaṇḍe /
analyzed: ratna āmayam yānam idam variṣṭham gacchanti yena u iha bodhimaṇḍe

original: vikrīḍamānā bahubodhisattvā ye co śṛṇonti sugatasya śrāvakāḥ // Saddhp_3.95 //
analyzed: vikrīḍamānāḥ bahu bodhisattvāḥ ye śṛṇonti sugatasya śrāvakāḥ

original: evaṃ prajānāhi tvamadya tiṣya nāstīha yānaṃ dvitiyaṃ kahiṃcit /

original: tato vayaṃ bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāradhānasadṛśānanuvicintayitāḥ /
analyzed: tatas vayam bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāra dhāna sadṛśān anuvicintayitāḥ

original: teṣu cāsma prayuktā ghaṭamānā vyāyacchamānāḥ /
analyzed: teṣu ca āsma prayuktāḥ ghaṭamānāḥ vyāyacchamānāḥ

original: nirvāṇamātraṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan divasamudrāmiva paryeṣamāṇā mārgāmaḥ /
analyzed: nirvāṇa mātram ca vayam bhagavan divasa mudrām iva paryeṣamāṇāḥ mārgāmaḥ

original: tena ca vayaṃ bhagavan nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭā bhavāmaḥ /
analyzed: tena ca vayam bhagavat nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭāḥ bhavāmaḥ

original: bahu ca labdhamiti manyāmahe tathāgatasyāntikāt eṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā /
analyzed: bahu ca labdham iti manyāmahe tathāgatasya antikāt eṣu dharmeṣu abhiyuktāḥ ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā

original: prajānāti ca tathāgato 'smākaṃ hīnādhimuktikatām,
analyzed: prajānāti ca tathāgataḥ smākam hīna adhimuktika tām

original: tataśca bhagavānasmānupekṣate,
analyzed: tatas ca bhagavān asmān upekṣate

original: na saṃbhinatti,
analyzed: na saṃbhinatti

original: nācaṣṭe - yo 'yaṃ tathāgatasya jñānakośaḥ,
analyzed: na ācaṣṭe yaḥ yam tathāgatasya jñāna kośaḥ

original: eṣa eva yuṣmākaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva yuṣmākam bhaviṣyati iti

original: bhagavāṃścāsmākamupāyakauśalyena asmiṃstathāgatajñānakośe dāyādān saṃsthāpayati /
analyzed: bhagavān ca asmākam upāya kauśalyena asmin tathāgata jñāna kośe dāyādān saṃsthāpayati

original: niḥspṛhāśca vayaṃ bhagavan /
analyzed: niḥspṛhāḥ ca vayam bhagavan

original: tata evaṃ jānīma - etadevāsmākaṃ bahukaraṃ yadvayaṃ tathāgatasyāntikāddivasamudrāmiva nirvāṇaṃ pratilabhāmahe /
analyzed: tatas evam jānīma etat eva asmākam bahukaram yat vayam tathāgatasya antikāt divasamudrām iva nirvāṇam pratilabhāmahe

original: te vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanamārabhya udārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurmaḥ /
analyzed: te vayam bhagavan bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām tathāgata jñāna darśanam ārabhya udārām dharma deśanām kurmaḥ

original: tathāgatajñānaṃ vivarāmo darśayāma upadarśayāmaḥ /
analyzed: tathāgata jñānam vivarāmaḥ darśayāmaḥ upadarśayāmaḥ

original: vayaṃ bhagavaṃstato niḥspṛhāḥ samānāḥ /
analyzed: vayam bhagavan tatas niḥspṛhāḥ samānāḥ

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: upāyakauśalyena tathāgato 'smākamadhimuktiṃ prajānāti /
analyzed: upāya kauśalyena tathāgataḥ smākam adhimuktim prajānāti

original: tacca vayaṃ na jānīmo na budhyāmahe yadidaṃ bhagavatā etarhi kathitam - yathā vayaṃ bhagavato bhūtāḥ putrāḥ,
analyzed: tat ca vayam na jānīmaḥ na budhyāmahe yat idam bhagavatā etarhi kathitam yathā vayam bhagavataḥ bhūtāḥ putrāḥ

original: bhagavāṃścāsmākaṃ smārayati tathāgatajñānadāyādān /
analyzed: bhagavān ca asmākam smārayati tathāgata jñāna dāyādān

original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yathāpi nāma vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti,
analyzed: yathā api nāma vayam tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti

original: api tu khalu punarhīnādhimuktāḥ /
analyzed: api tu khalu punar hīna adhimuktāḥ

original: saced bhagavānasmākaṃ paśyedadhimuktibalam,
analyzed: saced bhagavān asmākam paśyet adhimukti balam

original: bodhisattvaśabdaṃ bhagavānasmākamudāharet /
analyzed: bodhisattva śabdam bhagavān asmākam udāharet

original: vayaṃ punarbhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ - bodhisattvānāṃ cāgrato hīnādhimuktikā ityuktāḥ,
analyzed: vayam punar bhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ bodhisattvānām ca agratas hīna adhimuktikāḥ iti uktāḥ

original: te codārāyāṃ buddhabodhau samādāpitāḥ,
analyzed: te ca udārāyām buddha bodhau samādāpitāḥ

original: asmākaṃ cedānīṃ bhagavānadhimuktibalaṃ jñātvā idamudāhṛtavān /
analyzed: asmākam ca idānīm bhagavān adhimukti balam jñātvā idam udāhṛtavān

original: anena vayaṃ bhagavan paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmaḥ - sahasaivāsmābhirniḥspṛhairākāṅkṣitamamārgitamaparyeṣitamacintitamaprārthitaṃ
analyzed: anena vayam bhagavan paryāyeṇa evam vadāmaḥ sahasā eva asmābhiḥ niḥspṛhaiḥ ākāṅkṣitam a mārgitam a paryeṣitam a cintitam a prārthitam

original: sarvajñatāratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ yathāpīdaṃ tathāgatasya putraiḥ //
analyzed: sarvajña tā ratnam pratilabdham yathā api idam tathāgatasya putraiḥ

original: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahākāśyapastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣat

original: āścaryabhūtāḥ sma tathādbhutāśca audbilyaprāptāḥ sma śruṇitva ghoṣam /
analyzed: āścarya bhūtāḥ sma tathā adbhutāḥ ca audbilya prāptāḥ sma ghoṣam

original: sahasaiva asmābhirayaṃ tathādya manojñaghoṣaḥ śrutu nāyakasya // Saddhp_4.1 //
analyzed: sahasā eva asmābhiḥ ayam tathā adya manojña ghoṣaḥ nāyakasya

original: viśiṣṭaratnāna mahantarāśirmuhūrtamātreṇayamadya labdhaḥ /
analyzed: mahanta rāśiḥ muhūrta mātreṇa ayam adya labdhaḥ

original: (Vaidya 76)
analyzed: vaidya

original: na cintito nāpi kadāci prārthitastaṃ śrutva āścaryagatāḥ sma sarve // Saddhp_4.2 //
analyzed: na cintitaḥ na api kadācid prārthitaḥ tam śrutvā āścarya gatāḥ sma sarve

original: yathāpi bālaḥ puruṣo bhaveta utplāvito bālajanena santaḥ /
analyzed: yathā api bālaḥ puruṣaḥ bhaveta utplāvitaḥ bāla janena santaḥ

original: pituḥ sakāśātu apakrameta anyaṃ ca deśaṃ vraji so sudūram // Saddhp_4.3 //
analyzed: pituḥ sakāśātu apakrameta anyam ca deśam su dūram

original: pitā ca taṃ śocati tasmi kāle palāyitaṃ jñātva svakaṃ hi putram /
analyzed: pitā ca tam śocati tasmi kāle palāyitam jñātvā svakam hi putram

original: śocantu so digvidiśāsu añce varṣāṇi pañcāśadanūnakāni // Saddhp_4.4 //
analyzed: śocantu saḥ diś vidiśāsu añce varṣāṇi pañcāśat anūnakāni

original: tathā ca so putra gaveṣamāṇo anyaṃ mahantaṃ nagaraṃ hi gatvā /
analyzed: tathā ca saḥ putra gaveṣamāṇaḥ anyam mahantam nagaram hi gatvā

original: niveśanaṃ māpiya tatra tiṣṭhet samarpito kāmugaṇehi pañcabhiḥ // Saddhp_4.5 //
analyzed: niveśanam tatra tiṣṭhet pañcabhiḥ

original: bahuṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyaṃ dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālam /
analyzed: bahum hiraṇyam ca suvarṇa rūpyam dhānyam dhanam śaṅkha śilā pravālam

original: hastī ca aśvāśca padātayaśca gāvaḥ paśūścaiva tathaiḍakāśca // Saddhp_4.6 //
analyzed: hastī ca aśvāḥ ca padātayaḥ ca gāvaḥ paśūḥ ca eva tathā eḍakāḥ ca

original: prayoga āyoga tathaiva kṣetrā dāsī ca dāsā bahu preṣyavargaḥ /
analyzed: prayoga āyoga tathā eva kṣetrāḥ dāsī ca dāsāḥ bahu preṣya vargaḥ

original: susatkṛtaḥ prāṇisahasrakoṭibhī rājñaśca so vallabhu nityakālam // Saddhp_4.7 //
analyzed: su satkṛtaḥ prāṇi sahasra koṭibhiḥ rājñaḥ ca saḥ vallabhu nityakālam

original: kṛtāñjalī tasya bhavanti nāgarā grāmeṣu ye cāpi vasanti grāmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: kṛta añjalī tasya bhavanti nāgarāḥ grāmeṣu ye ca api vasanti grāmiṇaḥ

original: bahuvāṇijāstasya vrajanti antike bahūhi kāryehi kṛtādhikārāḥ // Saddhp_4.8 //
analyzed: bahu vāṇijāḥ tasya vrajanti antike bahuhi kāryehi kṛta adhikārāḥ

original: etādṛśo ṛddhimato naraḥ syājjīrṇaśca vṛddhaśca mahallakaśca /
analyzed: etādṛśaḥ ṛddhimataḥ naraḥ syāt jīrṇaḥ ca vṛddhaḥ ca mahallakaḥ ca

original: sa putraśokaṃ anucintayantaḥ kṣapeya rātriṃdiva nityakālam // Saddhp_4.9 //
analyzed: sa putra śokam anucintayantaḥ kṣapeya rātriṃdiva nityakālam

original: (Vaidya 77)
analyzed: vaidya

original: sa tādṛśo durmati mahya putraḥ pañcāśa varṣāṇi tadā palānakaḥ /
analyzed: sa tādṛśaḥ putraḥ pañcāśa varṣāṇi tadā palānakaḥ

original: ayaṃ ca kośo vipulo mamāsti kālakriyā co mama pratyupasthitā // Saddhp_4.10 //
analyzed: ayam ca kośaḥ vipulaḥ mama asti kālakriyā mama pratyupasthitā

original: so cāpi bālo tada tasya putro daridrakaḥ kṛpaṇaku nityakālam /
analyzed: tasya putraḥ daridrakaḥ

original: grāmeṇa grāmaṃ anucaṃkramantaḥ paryeṣate bhakta athāpi colam // Saddhp_4.11 //
analyzed: grāmeṇa grāmam anucaṃkramantaḥ paryeṣate bhakta atha api colam

original: paryeṣamāṇo 'pi kadāci kiṃcillabheta kiṃcit puna naiva kiṃcit /
analyzed: paryeṣamāṇaḥ pi kadācid kiṃcid labheta kiṃcid punar na eva kiṃcid

original: sa śuṣyate paraśaraṇeṣu bālo dadrūya kaṇḍūya ca digdhagātraḥ // Saddhp_4.12 //
analyzed: sa śuṣyate para śaraṇeṣu bālaḥ dadrūya kaṇḍūya ca digdha gātraḥ

original: so ca vrajettaṃ nagaraṃ yahiṃ pitā anupūrvaśo tatra gato bhaveta /
analyzed: saḥ ca vrajet tam nagaram yahim pitā tatra gataḥ bhaveta

original: bhaktaṃ ca colaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇo niveśanaṃ yatra pituḥ svakasya // Saddhp_4.13 //
analyzed: bhaktam ca colam ca gaveṣamāṇaḥ niveśanam yatra pituḥ svakasya

original: so cāpi āḍhyaḥ puruṣo mahādhano dvārasmi siṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ca api āḍhyaḥ puruṣaḥ mahādhanaḥ siṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ

original: parivāritaḥ prāṇiśatairanekairvitāna tasyā vitato 'ntarīkṣe // Saddhp_4.14 //
analyzed: parivāritaḥ prāṇi śataiḥ anekaiḥ vitāna tasyāḥ vitataḥ ntarīkṣe

original: āpto janaścāsya samantataḥ sthito dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca gaṇenti kecit /
analyzed: āptaḥ janaḥ ca asya samantataḥ sthitaḥ dhanam hiraṇyam ca gaṇenti kecid

original: kecittu lekhānapi lekhayanti kecit prayogaṃ ca prayojayanti // Saddhp_4.15 //
analyzed: kecid tu lekhān api lekhayanti kecid prayogam ca prayojayanti

original: so cā daridro tahi etu dṛṣṭvā vibhūṣitaṃ gṛhapatino niveśanam /
analyzed: saḥ cā daridraḥ dṛṣṭvā vibhūṣitam gṛhapatinaḥ niveśanam

original: kahiṃ nu adya ahamatra āgato rājā ayaṃ bheṣyati rājamātraḥ // Saddhp_4.16 //
analyzed: kahim nu adya aham atra āgataḥ rājā ayam rājamātraḥ

original: mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
analyzed: mā dāni doṣam pi labheyam atra gṛhṇitvā veṣṭim pi ca kārayeyam

original: (Vaidya 78)
analyzed: vaidya

original: anucintayantaḥ sa palāyate naro daridravīthīṃ paripṛcchamānaḥ // Saddhp_4.17 //
analyzed: anucintayantaḥ sa palāyate naraḥ daridra vīthīm paripṛcchamānaḥ

original: so cā dhanī taṃ svaku putra dṛṣṭvā siṃhāsanasthaśca bhavet prahṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: dhanī tam dṛṣṭvā siṃhāsana sthaḥ ca bhavet prahṛṣṭaḥ

original: sa dūtakān preṣayi tasya antike ānetha etaṃ puruṣaṃ daridram // Saddhp_4.18 //
analyzed: sa dūtakān preṣayi tasya antike ānetha etam puruṣam daridram

original: samanantaraṃ tehi gṛhītu so naro gṛhītamātro 'tha ca mūrccha gacchet /
analyzed: samanantaram saḥ naraḥ gṛhīta mātraḥ ca gacchet

original: dhrūvaṃ khu mahyaṃ vadhakā upasthitāḥ kiṃ mahya colenatha bhojanena vā // Saddhp_4.19 //
analyzed: dhrūvam khu mahyam vadhakāḥ upasthitāḥ kim bhojanena vā

original: dṛṣṭvā ca so paṇḍitu taṃ mahādhanī hīnādhimukto ayu bāla durmatiḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca saḥ tam mahā dhanī hīna adhimuktaḥ bāla durmatiḥ

original: na śraddadhī mahyamimāṃ vibhūṣitāṃ pitā mamāyaṃ ti na cāpi śraddadhīt // Saddhp_4.20 //
analyzed: na śraddadhī mahyam imām vibhūṣitām pitā mama ayam na ca api śraddadhīt

original: puruṣāṃśca so tatra prayojayeta vaṅkāśca ye kāṇaka kuṇṭhakāśca /
analyzed: puruṣān ca saḥ tatra prayojayeta vaṅkāḥ ca ye kāṇaka kuṇṭhakāḥ ca

original: kucelakāḥ kṛṣṇaka hīnasattvāḥ paryeṣathā taṃ naru karmakārakam // Saddhp_4.21 //
analyzed: ku celakāḥ kṛṣṇaka hīna sattvāḥ paryeṣathāḥ tam naru karma kārakam

original: saṃkāradhānaṃ imu mahya pūtikamuccāraprasrāvavināśitaṃ ca /
analyzed: saṃkāra dhānam ca

original: taṃ śodhanārthāya karohi karma dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ pradāsye // Saddhp_4.22 //
analyzed: tam śodhana arthāya karohi karma dviguṇam ca te vetanakam pradāsye

original: etādṛśaṃ ghoṣa śruṇitva so naro āgatya saṃśodhayi taṃ pradeśam /
analyzed: etādṛśam saḥ naraḥ āgatya tam pradeśam

original: tatraiva so āvasathaṃ ca kuryānniveśanasyopalikuñcike 'smin // Saddhp_4.23 //
analyzed: tatra eva saḥ āvasatham ca kuryāt niveśanasya upali kuñcike smin

original: so cā dhanī taṃ puruṣaṃ nirīkṣed gavākṣaolokanake 'pi nityam /
analyzed: saḥ cā dhanī tam puruṣam nirīkṣet nityam

original: hīnādhimukto ayu mahya putraḥ saṃkāradhānaṃ śucikaṃ karoti // Saddhp_4.24 //
analyzed: putraḥ saṃkāra dhānam śucikam karoti

original: (Vaidya 79)
analyzed: vaidya

original: sa otaritvā piṭakaṃ gṛhītvā malināni vastrāṇi ca prāvaritvā /
analyzed: saḥ otaritvā piṭakam gṛhītvā malināni vastrāṇi ca prāvaritvā

original: upasaṃkramettasya narasya antike avabhartsayanto na karotha karma // Saddhp_4.25 //
analyzed: upasaṃkramet tasya narasya antike avabhartsayantaḥ na karotha karma

original: dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ dadāmi dviguṇāṃ ca bhūyastatha pādamrakṣaṇam /
analyzed: dviguṇam ca te vetanakam dadāmi dviguṇām ca pāda mrakṣaṇam

original: saloṇabhaktaṃ ca dadāmi tubhya śākaṃ ca śāṭiṃ ca punardadāmi // Saddhp_4.26 //
analyzed: sa loṇa bhaktam ca dadāmi śākam ca śāṭim ca punar dadāmi

original: evaṃ ca taṃ bhartsiya tasmi kāle saṃśleṣayettaṃ punareva paṇḍitaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca tam tasmin kāle saṃśleṣayet tam punar eva paṇḍitaḥ

original: suṣṭhuṃ khalū karma karoṣi atra putro 'si vyaktaṃ mama nātra saṃśayaḥ // Saddhp_4.27 //
analyzed: khalu karma karoṣi atra vyaktam mama na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: sa stokastokaṃ ca gṛhaṃ praveśayet karmaṃ ca kārāpayi taṃ manuṣyam /
analyzed: sa stoka stokam ca gṛham praveśayet karmam ca kārāpayi tam manuṣyam

original: viṃśacca varṣāṇi supūritāni krameṇa viśrambhayi taṃ naraṃ saḥ // Saddhp_4.28 //
analyzed: viṃśat ca varṣāṇi su pūritāni krameṇa tam naram saḥ

original: hiraṇyu so mauktiku sphāṭikaṃ ca pratisāmayettatra niveśanasmin /
analyzed: ca sphāṭikam

original: sarvaṃ ca so saṃgaṇanāṃ karoti arthaṃ ca sarvaṃ anucintayeta // Saddhp_4.29 //
analyzed: sarvam ca saḥ saṃgaṇanām karoti artham ca sarvam anucintayeta

original: bahirdhā so tasya niveśanasya kuṭikāya eko vasamānu bālaḥ /
analyzed: bahirdhā saḥ tasya niveśanasya kuṭikāya ekaḥ bālaḥ

original: daridracintāmanucintayeta na me 'sti etādṛśa bhoga kecit // Saddhp_4.30 //
analyzed: daridra cintām anucintayeta na me sti etādṛśa bhoga kecid

original: jñātvā ca so tasya imevarūpamudārasaṃjñābhigato mi putraḥ /
analyzed: jñātvā ca saḥ tasya putraḥ

original: sa ānayitvā suhṛjñātisaṃghaṃ niryātayiṣyāmyahu sarvamartham // Saddhp_4.31 //
analyzed: saḥ ānayitvā suhṛd jñāti saṃgham niryātayiṣyāmi ahu sarvam artham

original: rājāna so naigamanāgarāṃśca samānayitvā bahuvāṇijāṃśca /
analyzed: rājāna saḥ naigama nāgarān ca samānayitvā bahu vāṇijān ca

original: (Vaidya 80)
analyzed: vaidya

original: uvāca evaṃ pariṣāya madhye putro mamāyaṃ cira vipranaṣṭakaḥ // Saddhp_4.32 //
analyzed: uvāca evam madhye putraḥ mama ayam cira vipranaṣṭakaḥ

original: pañcāśa varṣāṇi supūrṇakāni anye ca 'to viṃśatiye mi dṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: pañcāśa varṣāṇi supūrṇakāni anye ca dṛṣṭaḥ

original: amukātu nagarātu mamaiṣa naṣṭo ahaṃ ca mārganta ihaivamāgataḥ // Saddhp_4.33 //
analyzed: mama eṣa naṣṭaḥ aham ca mārgantaḥ iha evam āgataḥ

original: sarvasya dravyasya ayaṃ prabhurme etasya niryātayi sarvaśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: sarvasya dravyasya ayam prabhuḥ me etasya sarvaśeṣataḥ

original: karotu kāryaṃ ca piturdhanena sarvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ ca dadāmi etat // Saddhp_4.34 //
analyzed: karotu kāryam ca pituḥ dhanena sarvam kuṭumbam ca dadāmi etat

original: āścaryaprāptaśca bhavennaro 'sau daridrabhāvaṃ purimaṃ smaritvā /
analyzed: āścarya prāptaḥ ca sau daridra bhāvam pur imam smaritvā

original: hīnādhimuktiṃ ca pituśca tān guṇāṃllabdhvā kuṭumbaṃ sukhito 'smi adya // Saddhp_4.35 //

original: (Vaidya 83)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: bahu prakāram hi bravīti dharmam nidarśayantaḥ imam agra bodhim

original: (Vaidya 107)
analyzed: vaidya

original: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣava indradhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho brahmadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /

original: ahaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ

original: (Vaidya 128)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: kathām śrutvā imām ca bhagavataḥ vṛṣabha tām śrutvā āścarya prāptaḥ bhūt adbhuta prāptaḥ

original: (Vaidya 169)

analyzed: punar aparam mañjuśriḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle

analyzed: vastrāṇi dadāti

original: veṣṭanāni hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni karṇābharaṇāni sauvarṇasūtrāṇi hārārdhahārāṇi hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālānyapi
analyzed: veṣṭanāni hasta ābharaṇāni pāda ābharaṇāni kaṇṭha ābharaṇāni karṇa ābharaṇāni sauvarṇa sūtrāṇi hāra ardhahārāṇi hiraṇya suvarṇa maṇi muktā vaiḍūrya śaṅkha śilā pravālāni api

analyzed: hasti aśva ratha patti dāsī dāsān api dadāti

analyzed: yānāni śibikāḥ ca dadāti

analyzed: na punar kasyacid cūḍāmaṇim dadāti

analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: ekaḥ eva hi sa cūḍāmaṇiḥ rājñaḥ mūrdha sthāyī

analyzed: yadā punar mañjuśrīḥ rājā tam api cūḍāmaṇim dadāti

analyzed: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataḥ pi arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharma svāmī dharma rājā svena bāhu bala nirjitena puṇya bala nirjitena traidhātuke dharmeṇa

analyzed: dharma rājyam kārayati

analyzed: atha khalu tathāgatasya api āryāḥ yodhāḥ māreṇa sārdham yudhyante

analyzed: yodhānām yudhyatām dṛṣṭvā vividhāni sūtra śata sahasrāṇi bhāṣate sma catasṛṇām parṣadām saṃharṣaṇa artham

analyzed: tatra mañjuśrīḥ yathā sa rājā bala cakravartī teṣām yodhānām yudhyatām mahatā puruṣakāreṇa

original: vismāpitaḥ samānaḥ paścāttaṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ paścimaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti sarvalokāśraddheyaṃ vismayabhūtam /
analyzed: vismāpitaḥ samānaḥ paścāt tam sarvasva bhūtam paścimam cūḍāmaṇim dadāti sarva loka aśraddheyam vismaya bhūtam

analyzed: yathā mañjuśrīḥ tasya rājñaḥ sa cūḍāmaṇiḥ cira rakṣitaḥ mūrdha sthāyī

analyzed: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ traidhātuke dharma rājaḥ dharmeṇa rājyam kārayamāṇaḥ yasmin samaye

original: paśyati śrāvakāṃśca bodhisattvāṃśca skandhamāreṇa vā kleśamāreṇa vā sārdhaṃ yudhyamānān,

original: taiśca sārdhaṃ yudhyamānairyadā rāgadveṣamohakṣayaḥ sarvatraidhātukānniḥsaraṇaṃ sarvamāranirghātanaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraḥ kṛto bhavati,
analyzed: taiḥ ca sārdham yudhyamānaiḥ yadā rāga dveṣa moha kṣayaḥ sarva traidhātukāt niḥsaraṇam sarva māra nirghātanam mahā puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati

original: tadā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'pyārāgitaḥ samānasteṣāmāryḥṇḥṃ yodhḥnḥmimamevaṃrūpaṃ
analyzed: tadā tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pi ārāgitaḥ samānaḥ teṣām āryaḥ imam evaṃrūpam

original: sarvalokavipratyanīkaṃ sarvalokḥśraddheyamabhḥṣitapūrvamanirdiṣṭapūrvaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ bhḥṣate sma /
analyzed: sarva loka vipratyanīkam sarva loka śraddheyam a bhḥṣita pūrvam a nirdiṣṭa pūrvam dharma paryḥyam bhḥṣate sma

original: sarveṣḥṃ sarvajñatḥhḥrakaṃ mahḥcūḍḥmaṇiprakhyaṃ tathḥgataḥ śrḥvakebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
analyzed: sarveṣṭam mahḥcūḍḥmaṇi prakhyam tathḥgataḥ śrḥvakebhyaḥ nuprayacchati sma

original: eṣḥ hi mañjuśrīstathḥgatḥnḥṃ paramḥ dharmadeśanḥ,
analyzed: eṣḥ hi paramḥ dharma deśanḥ

analyzed: ayam dharmaparyḥyaḥ

analyzed: sarveṣām dharmaparyḥyḥṇḥmayam dharmaparyḥyaḥ sarva gambhīraḥ sarva loka vipratyanīkaḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ mañjuśrīstathḥgatena adya tenaiva rḥjñḥ balacakravartinḥ ciraparirakṣitaścūḍḥmaṇiravamucya yodhebhyo dattaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yam mañjuśrīḥ tathḥgatena adya tena eva ṛḍjñā bala cakravartinḥ cira parirakṣitaḥ cūḍḥmaṇiḥ avamucya yodhebhyaḥ dattaḥ

original: evameva mañjuśrīstathḥgato 'pīmaṃ dharmaguhyaṃ cirḥnurakṣitaṃ sarvadharmaparyḥyḥṇḥṃ mūrdhasthḥyi tathḥgatavijñeyam /
analyzed: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ tathḥgataḥ u pi imam dharma guhyam cir anurakṣitam sarva dharma paryḥṇḍṃ mūrdha sthḥyi tathḥgata vijñeyam

original: tadidaṃ tathḥgatenḥdya saṃprakḥśitamiti //
analyzed: tat idam saṃprakḥśitam iti

original: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān etam eva artham bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānaḥ tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣata

original: maitrībalaṃ co sada darśayantaḥ kṛpāyamāṇaḥ sada sarvasattvān /
analyzed: maitrī balam darśayantaḥ kṛpāyamāṇaḥ sarva sattvān

analyzed: prakāśayet dharmam imā eva rūpam sūtram viśiṣṭam sugate hi varṇitam

original: (Vaidya 175)
analyzed: vaidya

original: gṛhastha ye pravrajitāśca ye syuratha bodhisattvāstada kāli paścime /
analyzed: gṛhastha ye pravrajitāḥ ca ye syuḥ atha bodhisattvāḥ tada kāli paścime

original: sarveṣu maitrībala so hi darśayī mā haiva kṣepsyanti śruṇitva dharmam // Saddhp_13.46 //
analyzed: sarveṣu hi mā ha eva kṣepsyanti dharmam

original: ahaṃ tu bodhimanuprāpuṇitvā yadā sthito bheṣyi tathāgatatve /
analyzed: aham tu bodhim anuprāpuṇitvā yadā sthitaḥ tathāgata tve

analyzed: tatas upāneṣyi upāyi sthitvā saṃśrāvayiṣye imam agra bodhim

analyzed: yathā api rājā bala cakravartī dadyāt vividham hiraṇyam

analyzed: hastīn ca aśvān ca rathān padātīn nagarāṇi grāmān ca dadāti tuṣṭaḥ

analyzed: keṣāṃci hasta ābharaṇāni prītaḥ dadāti rūpyam ca suvarṇa sūtram

analyzed: muktāmaṇim śaṅkha śilā pravālam vividhān ca dāsān sa dadāti prītaḥ

analyzed: yadā tu saḥ uttama sāṃhasena vismāpitaḥ kenacid tatra

analyzed: vijñāya āścaryam idam kṛtam mukuṭam sa muñcitvā maṇim dadāti

analyzed: tathā eva buddhaḥ ahu dharma rājā kṣāntī balaḥ prajña prabhūta kośaḥ

analyzed: dharmeṇa śāsām imu sarva lokam hita anukampī karūṇāyamānaḥ

analyzed: sattvān ca dṛṣṭvā atha vihanyamānān bhāṣāmi sūtrānta sahasra koṭyaḥ

analyzed: parākramam prāṇinām ye śuddha sattvāḥ iha kleśa ghātinaḥ

original: (Vaidya 176)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: jñātvā ca sattvān balavantu jñānī cūḍāmaṇim vā

analyzed: vadāmi sūtram sarveṣa mama agra bhūtam

analyzed: saṃrakṣitam me na ca jātu proktam tam śrāvayāmi adya sarve

analyzed: catvāri dharmā imi evarūpāḥ mayi nirvṛte ye ca niṣevitavyāḥ

analyzed: ye ca arthikāḥ uttamam agra bodhau vyāpāraṇam ye ca karonti mahyam

analyzed: na tasya śokaḥ na ca antarāyaḥ daurvarṇikam na api gilānaka tvam

original: na ca cchavī kṛṣṇika tasya bhoti na cāpi hīne nagarasmi vāsaḥ // Saddhp_13.56 //
analyzed: na ca chavī na ca api hīne vāsaḥ

original: priyadarśano 'sau satataṃ maharṣī tathāgato vā yatha pūjya bhoti /
analyzed: priyadarśanaḥ sau satatam mahā ṛṣī tathāgataḥ vā

analyzed: upasthāyakāḥ tasya bhavanti nityam ye deva putrāḥ daharāḥ bhavanti

analyzed: na tasya śastram na viṣam kadācid kāye krame na api ca daṇḍa loṣṭam

original: saṃmīlitaṃ tasya mukhaṃ bhaveya yo tasya ākrośamapī vadeyā // Saddhp_13.58 //
analyzed: saṃmīlitam tasya mukham bhaveya tasya vadeyā

original: so bandhubhūto bhavatīha prāṇināmālokajāto vicarantu medinīm /
analyzed: saḥ bandhu bhūtaḥ bhavati iha prāṇinām āloka jātaḥ vicarantu medinīm

original: timiraṃ haranto bahuprāṇakoṭināṃ yo sūtradhāre imu nirvṛte mayi // Saddhp_13.59 //
analyzed: timiram harantaḥ bahu prāṇa koṭinām sūtradhāre nirvṛte mayi

original: supinasmi so paśyati bhadrarūpaṃ bhikṣūṃśca so paśyati bhikṣuṇīśca /
analyzed: supin asmi saḥ paśyati bhadra rūpam bhikṣūn ca saḥ paśyati bhikṣuṇīḥ ca

original: sihāsanasthaṃ ca tathātmabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ prakāśentu bahuprakāram // Saddhp_13.60 //
analyzed: sihāsana stham ca tathā ātmabhāvam dharmam prakāśentu bahu prakāram

original: (Vaidya 177)
analyzed: vaidya

original: devāṃśca yakṣān yatha gaṅgāvālikā asurāṃśca nāgāṃśca bahuprakārān /
analyzed: devān ca yakṣān gaṅgāvālikāḥ asurān ca nāgān ca bahu prakārān

original: teṣāṃ ca so bhāṣati agradharmaṃ supinasmi sarveṣa kṛtāñjalīnām // Saddhp_13.61 //
analyzed: teṣām ca saḥ bhāṣati agra dharmam sarveṣa kṛtāñjalīnām

original: tathāgataṃ so supinasmi paśyati deśenta dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭinām /
analyzed: tathāgatam saḥ paśyati deśenta dharmam bahu prāṇi koṭinām

original: raśmīsahasrāṇi pramuñcamānaṃ valgusvaraṃ kāñcanavarṇanātham // Saddhp_13.62 //
analyzed: raśmī sahasrāṇi pramuñcamānam valgu svaram kāñcana varṇa nātham

original: so cā tahī bhoti kṛtāñjalisthito abhiṣṭuvanto dvipaduttamaṃ munim /
analyzed: abhiṣṭuvantaḥ dvipad uttamam munim

original: so cā jino bhāṣati agradharmaṃ caturṇa parṣāṇa mahābhiṣaṭūkaḥ // Saddhp_13.63 //
analyzed: saḥ cā jinaḥ bhāṣati agra dharmam

original: so ca prahṛṣṭo bhavatī śruṇitvā prāmodyajātaśca karoti pūjām /
analyzed: saḥ ca prahṛṣṭaḥ bhavatī śruṇitvā prāmodya jātaḥ ca karoti pūjām

original: supine ca so dhāraṇi prāpuṇoti avivartiyaṃ jñāna spṛśitva kṣipram // Saddhp_13.64 //
analyzed: supine ca saḥ dhāraṇi prāpuṇoti jñāna spṛśitva kṣipram

original: jñātvā ca so āśayu lokanāthastaṃ vyākarotī puruṣarṣabhatve /
analyzed: jñātvā ca saḥ lokanāthaḥ tam vyākaroti puruṣa ṛṣabha tve

original: kulaputra tvaṃ pīha anuttaraṃ śivaṃ spṛśiṣyasi jñānamanāgate 'dhvani // Saddhp_13.65 //
analyzed: kula putra tvam pi iha anuttaram śivam spṛśiṣyasi jñānam anāgate dhvani

original: tavāpi kṣetraṃ vipulaṃ bhaviṣyati parṣāśca catvāri yathaiva mahyam /
analyzed: tava api kṣetram vipulam bhaviṣyati parṣāḥ ca catvāri yathā eva mahyam

original: śroṣyanti dharmaṃ vipulaṃ anāsravaṃ sagauravā bhūtva kṛtāñjalī ca // Saddhp_13.66 //
analyzed: śroṣyanti dharmam vipulam anāsravam sa gauravāḥ bhūtvā kṛtāñjalī ca

original: punaśca so paśyati ātmabhāvaṃ bhāventa dharmaṃ girikandareṣu /
analyzed: punar ca saḥ paśyati ātma bhāvam dharmam giri kandareṣu

original: bhāvitva dharmaṃ ca spṛśitva dharmatāṃ samādhi so labdhu jinaṃ ca paśyati // Saddhp_13.67 //
analyzed: dharmam ca spṛśitva dharmatām samādhi saḥ labdhu jinam ca paśyati

original: suvarṇavarṇaṃ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇaṃ supinasmi dṛṣṭvā ca śṛṇoti dharmam /
analyzed: suvarṇa varṇam śata puṇya lakṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā ca śṛṇoti dharmam

original: (Vaidya 178)
analyzed: vaidya

original: śrutvā ca taṃ parṣadi saṃprakāśayī supino khu tasyo ayamevarūpaḥ // Saddhp_13.68 //
analyzed: śrutvā ca tam parṣadi saṃprakāśayī ayam evarūpaḥ

original: svapne 'pi sarvaṃ prajahitva rājyamantaḥpuraṃ jñātigaṇaṃ tathaiva /
analyzed: svapne sarvam prajahitvā rājyam antaḥpuram jñāti gaṇam tathā eva

original: (Vaidya 186)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: atha khalu maitreyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tasyām velāyām bhagavantam ābhiḥ gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣata

analyzed: mā ca yūyam putrāḥ śociṣṭha

analyzed: bahu bodhisattvān ca eva

original: (Vaidya 193)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: mām ca a paśyanti janenti tṛṣṇām tatas ūrjukam citta teṣām

analyzed: aham śrāvaka saṃgha gṛdhrakūṭe

analyzed: upāya kauśalya mama iti bhikṣavaḥ punar punar jīva loke

original: anyehi sattvehi puraskṛto 'haṃ teṣāṃ prakāśemi mamāgrabodhim /

analyzed: tāvat mama darśanasya saddharmu prakāśayiṣye

original: (Vaidya 194)

original: ārāmapuṣpopaśobhitāścaṃkramavanopetāḥ śayanāsanopastabdhāḥ khādyabhojyānnapānaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraparipūrṇāḥ sarvasukhopadhānapratimaṇḍitāḥ

original: te ca bahvaprameyā yaduta śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā koṭī vā koṭīśataṃ vā koṭīsahasraṃ vā koṭiśatasahasraṃ vā koṭīnayutaśatasahasraṃ  #
analyzed: te ca bahu aprameyāḥ yat uta śatam vā sahasram vā śata sahasram vā koṭī vā koṭī śatam vā koṭī sahasram vā koṭi śata sahasram vā koṭī nayuta śata sahasram

original: vā /
analyzed: vā

analyzed: te ca mama saṃmukham śrāvaka saṃghasya niryātitāḥ

analyzed: vā prajñayā vā saṃpādayet

analyzed: tathāgata caitya satkāra artham ca abhiyuktaḥ bhavet

analyzed: tathāgata śrāvakāṇām ca varṇam bhāṣeta

analyzed: apagata krodha manaskāraḥ vyāpanna manaskāraḥ smṛtimān ca sthāmavān ca bhavet

analyzed: vīryavān ca nitya abhiyuktaḥ ca bhavet

analyzed: buddha dharma paryeṣṭyā dhyāyī ca bhavet

analyzed: yasya kasyacid ajita bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imam dharmaparyāyam tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayataḥ ime evaṃrūpāḥ guṇāḥ bhaveyuḥ ye mayā

analyzed: saḥ jita kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā evam veditavyaḥ bodhimaṇḍa saṃprasthitaḥ yam kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bodhim abhisaṃboddhum bodhivṛkṣa mūlam

original: gacchati /
analyzed: gacchati

analyzed: yatra ca ajita sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tiṣṭhet vā niṣīdet vā caṃkramet vā

analyzed: tatra ajita tathāgatam uddiśya caityam kartavyam

analyzed: tathāgata stūpaḥ yam iti ca sa vaktavyaḥ sa devakena lokena iti

original: (Vaidya 203)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: brahma loka samāḥ uccā chatra āvalibhiḥ anvitāḥ

analyzed: madhurā vādya bhāṇḍā ca vāditā teṣu dhātuṣu

analyzed: īdṛśī me kṛtā tena vividhā

analyzed: agrāḥ vihāra koṭyaḥ bahu ścandana kāritāḥ

analyzed: yaḥ idam dhārayet sūtram nirvṛtasmin vināyake

analyzed: puṇyam labheta yaḥ etat sūtram vā aced likheta vā

original: (Vaidya 204)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: bhikṣūṇām praṇataḥ nityam na adhimānī na ca alasaḥ

original: prajñavāṃścaiva dhīraśca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na kupyati /
analyzed: prajñavān ca eva dhīraḥ ca praśnam pṛṣṭaḥ na kupyati

original: anulomaṃ ca deśeti kṛpābuddhī ca prāṇiṣu // Saddhp_16.55 //
analyzed: anulomam ca deśeti kṛpā buddhī ca prāṇiṣu

analyzed: na tasya puṇya skandhasya pramāṇam upalabhyate

analyzed: yadi kaścid naraḥ paśyet īdṛśam dharma bhāṇakam

analyzed: mayā sa bhuktaḥ pṛthivī pradeśaḥ mayā svayam caṃkramitam ca tatram

analyzed: tatra upaviṣṭaḥ aham eva ca syām yatra sthitaḥ saḥ buddha putraḥ

analyzed: iti śrī saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye puṇyaparyāyaparivartaḥ nāma ṣoḍaśamaḥ

original: (Vaidya 205)
analyzed: vaidya

original: Saddhp_17: anumodanāpuṇyanirdeśaparivartaḥ /
analyzed: anumodanā puṇya nirdeśa parivartaḥ

analyzed: atha khalu maitreyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat yaḥ bhagavan imam dharmaparyāyam deśyamānam śrutvā anumodet kula putraḥ vā

original: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavediti?

analyzed: atha khalu maitreyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tasyām velāyām imām gāthām abhāṣata

original: yo nirvṛte mahāvīre śṛṇuyātsūtramīdṛśam /
analyzed: yaḥ nirvṛte mahāvīre śṛṇuyāt sūtram īdṛśam

original: śrutvā cābhyanumodeyā kiyantaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavet // Saddhp_17.1 //

original: (Vaidya 228)
analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: vaidya

analyzed: tam ca bhagavantam śākyamunim tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham tam ca bhagavantam prabhūtaratnam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham namaskurudhvam

analyzed: atha khalu te sarva sattvāḥ imam evaṃrūpam antarīkṣāt nirghoṣam śrutvā tatrasthāḥ eva
